product_name: Cloverdale Milk Skim Instant Powder 10 KG/22lbs - Canadian Made
short_description:
Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder – High-Quality Dairy for Versatile Applications

Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder is a premium Canadian-made dairy ingredient, perfect for a wide range of culinary and industrial applications. With excellent solubility, dispersibility, and wettability, this high-protein, low-fat milk powder is ideal for baking, cooking, and beverage formulations.

Why Choose Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder?

Pure, Nutritious, and High-Quality

  • Made from 100% real skim milk, providing essential nutrients and a clean dairy taste.
  • High in protein and calcium, supporting balanced nutrition.

Superior Solubility & Easy Mixing

  • Dissolves instantly in hot or cold water, making it ideal for instant beverages and food applications.
  • Designed for excellent dispersion, ensuring smooth, lump-free results.

Versatile Culinary & Industrial Applications

  • Baking: Enhances texture, flavor, and browning in bread, cakes, and pastries.
  • Beverages: Perfect for hot cocoa, smoothies, coffee creamers, and protein shakes.
  • Soups & Sauces: Adds creaminess and richness to instant soups and dressings.
  • Desserts: Used in puddings, ice creams, and confectionery for a smooth finish.
  • Infant Formula & Nutritional Products: A trusted dairy base in powdered nutritional formulations.

Product Details

  • Size: 10 KG (22 lbs) bulk packaging
  • Made in Canada, ensuring strict quality control and premium standards
  • Shelf-Stable & Long-Lasting, perfect for commercial and home use

Ideal for Food Service & Manufacturing

Cloverdale Instant Skim Milk Powder is a reliable, high-quality ingredient for bakeries, food processors, beverage manufacturers, and home kitchens. Stock up today and experience the convenience of premium powdered dairy!

product_name: Ben & Jerry's Brownie Batter Core Ice Cream, 473 mL
short_description: Ben & Jerry's chocolate & vanilla ice creams, with fudge brownies and a brownie batter core, this flavour takes its brownies seriously. So, nothing would do but to have two: fully baked brownies scattered liberally throughout chocolate and vanilla ice creams, and gooey, unbaked brownie batter at the core.Sure, we’re a little biased about spoons around here; if your ice cream is having such a melt-down that you’re slurping it through a straw, it’d darned well better be in a glass and called a milkshake. We’re definitely all about the spoon here, so it didn’t take us long to realize that our favourite way to eat brownies was with our favourite utensil, straight out of the mixing bowl. But listen: we’ve got nothing against the folks who love the crispy edges on a pan of cooked brownies, or even those who eat their brownies with a fork and knife (even though we think it’s somewhat strange). So, we decided to meet in the [ooey, gooey, brownie batter-filled] middle: batter-lovers can sink a spoon into the Core, while fully baked brownie lovers get their fix around the edges. Happy bellies all around.All of Ben & Jerry’s cocoa, sugar and vanilla comes from Fairtrade certified producers. Our ice cream is made with non-GMO sourced ingredients, cage-free eggs and certified Canadian dairy.

When you pop open a pint of Ben & Jerry's Netflix & Chilll'd Ice Cream, a euphoric flavour adventure begins. Whether you’re streaming a laugh-out-loud comedy, an edge-of-your-seat drama, or a hey-I-didn’t-know-that documentary, it’s incomplete without a tasty treat and a few of your favourite friends. And with the perfect balance of sweet, salty, and chocolatey, Ben & Jerry's Netflix & Chilll'd is the ideal flavour accompaniment for all your favourite Netflix shows. Follow the sweet and salty pretzel swirls like you follow the plot twists of your favourite drama, or dig out a brownie piece every time you laugh out loud at that new comedy special. With a spoonful of peanut butter ice cream and your remote in hand, there’s nothing but euphoria in your future. Go forth and chillax, flavour warrior. Netflix & Chilll'd is made with Fairtrade certified sugar and vanilla, and all the ingredients are non-GMO sourced. We also use eggs from cage-free hens. Now that’s something you can feel wonderful about! This ice cream pint, like every pint we make, also features responsibly sourced packaging.

product_name: Magnum Double Caramel Ice Cream Bar, 3 x 90 ml
short_description: At Magnum, we believe that a day without pleasure is a day lost: Magnum's “Doubles” range of ice cream bars offers our ultimate indulgence for true pleasure seekers. Each ice cream bar is made with velvety smooth ice cream and is covered in a chocolatey layer, a layer of luscious sauce, and a final thick chocolate coating made with unsweetened Belgian chocolate. The result is the perfect combination of delicious flavours and textures in every bite. Magnum Double Caramel ice cream bars offer our ultimate delight for the senses: vanilla bean ice cream dipped in a chocolatey coating, rich caramel sauce, and milk chocolate. Our golden caramel sauce that covers the vanilla ice cream is basically pampered in Magnum chocolate. Available in both full-sized and mini bars. Bite into this luxurious treat unlike any other. Each flavour is made with Belgian chocolate that uses cocoa beans sourced from Rainforest Alliance Certified farms. Belgian chocolate has an outstanding reputation for its smooth, rich flavour and tempting chocolate aroma. It's recognized around the world because of its meticulous adherence to ‘Old World' craftsmanship. Magnum ice cream bars are crafted in this rich heritage and are made with a signature Belgian chocolate recipe developed specifically for us. While still warm, this delicious coating wraps around our velvety ice creams, instantly cooling to leave our signature solid, thick shell ready and waiting to be cracked. From intense to sweet to salty to dark, which one will satisfy your next indulgence?

product_name: Popsicle Revello Frozen Dairy Dessert Bars, 12 x 60 ml bars
short_description: Enjoy this family favourite, Popsicle Revello Frozen Dairy Dessert Bars is one of our most classic Popsicles! A creamy vanilla dairy bar surrounded by a thick, chocolatey coating, this frozen treat is great for any time of the year. They are also made with colours and flavours from natural sources, making them the perfect frozen dessert for the whole family. Ideal for any occasion, serve them at a party or keep them in the freezer for an after-dinner frozen snack. Popsicle pops have been a treasured treat for over 100 years and remain a Canadian family favourite. The very first Popsicle® ice pop was created way back in 1905 by an 11-year-old named Frank Epperson. That’s right, Popsicle was invented by a kid. After a long day of play, Frank went inside, but left his cup of soda with the stirring stick still in it out on the porch. The night got cold, and when Frank went outside the next morning, he found his drink frozen like an icicle. Frank called his invention the “Epsicle.” It was a hit with the kids at school, and later with his kids, who called it “Pop’s sicle.” The name was catchy, and the treat was delicious, so Frank patented it in 1923 to share his Popsicle ice pops with the world. A lot has happened since 1905, when the first Popsicle ice pop was made. Be sure to try our other products in the Popsicle® family and discover your favourite frozen treat, including our delicious Cyclone Popsicle® and malty fudge chocolate Popsicle Fudgsicle® bar.

product_name: Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Fudge Brownie Ice Cream, 473 mL
short_description: Fudgy chunks of brownie goodness mixed into dark and rich chocolate ice cream. Sounds like a dream. At first, that’s all it was. Long ago, we were making brownie ice cream sandwiches for sale in grocery stores. Sometimes there would be broken pieces in the brownie delivery, and we’d nab them for flavour experiments. What would brownie pieces taste like in chocolate ice cream? Pretty good, as it turns out! That original experimental flavour eventually became the legendary ice cream concoction known as Chocolate Fudge Brownie. Meanwhile, Ben Cohen had met Bernie Glassman, the founder of Greyston Bakery, a Yonkers, New York, USA-based company with a mission to end poverty and give back to the community. Equally important, their brownies were just so darn good—after sampling some, Ben handwrote a note asking for two truckloads of brownie pieces. While we knew Greyston would be the ideal supplier for turning Chocolate Fudge Brownie into a flavour sold by the tub, getting the brownies to cooperate wasn’t easy. After about 25 batches of brownies and six months of work, the flavour finally debuted in 1991, and it’s been a hit ever since. All the cocoa, sugar and vanilla Ben & Jerry's ice cream uses is Fairtrade certified, and the milk and cream comes from Canadian Dairy farmers. Greyston Bakery, one of the largest social enterprises in the USA, continues to provide the brownies for this and all of our brownie flavours. Our ice cream is made with 1% Canadian milk, free run eggs and Non-GMO ingredients. And all our packaging is responsibly sourced.

Proudly crafted in Ontario, Canada, DRUMSTICK Strawberry Cheesecake is made with Canadian dairy and has no artificial colours. Create some joyful memories with DRUMSTICK Strawberry Cheesecake frozen dessert and try our other DRUMSTICK tub flavours -- Vanilla Caramel and Chocolate Fudge Brownie. DRUMSTICK, the original sundae cone experience since 1928.

product_name: Ben & Jerry's Peanut Butter Half Baked Ice Cream, 473ml
short_description: A delightfully euphoric combination of chocolate and peanut butter ice creams with fudge brownies and gobs of peanut butter cookie dough. Can’t you just taste the awesome? Of course, you can! A special twist on our most popular flavour, Peanut Butter Half Baked makes the best even better with a gooey, gobbly, chunkalicious mix of fudgy brownies and peanut butter cookie dough. For peanut butter lovers, it’s a swirl of ice cream euphoria that simply can’t be beat. And for all you Half-Baked purists who call it sacrilege, grab a spoon and prepare to have your world flipped upside down.This flavour doesn’t just taste delicious but does good, too, by sourcing the fresh-baked brownies from fellow B Corp, Greyston Bakery, located in Yonkers, New York. Since 1982, this social enterprise has been paving the way to success for many of the city’s low-income residents through employment and education.The positive impact on both people and the planet doesn’t stop there. Like all of Ben & Jerry's flavours, Peanut Butter Half Baked is lovingly crafted with Non-GMO ingredients, 1% Canadian milk, eggs from free run hens, and kosher-certified milk and cream. Fairtrade certified suppliers provide the cocoa, sugar, and vanilla, plus the packaging is responsibly sourced.

product_name: Great Value Chocolatey Dipped Ice Cream Cups, 112 g
short_description: Want the scoop on how to make ice cream even sweeter? Get a hold of Great Value Chocolatey Dipped Ice Cream Cups and pile on sky-high scoops of your favourite flavour. Each crispy cup is coated with the perfect amount of chocolatey coating, and with 12 cups in every box, there’s plenty of delicious delight to share.

product_name: Ben & Jerry's Cherry Garcia® Ice Cream, 473 mL
short_description: Cherry ice cream with cherries and fudge flakes. It’s our tribute to legendary guitarist Jerry Garcia fans everywhere, and it all started with a piece of fan mail. You see, back in the day, before smartphones and social media, our fans spoke to us via handwritten notes pinned to the bulletin boards at our Scoop Shops. It was sometime in 1986 when one such fan was persistent enough to mail a postcard to our main office in Burlington, Vermont. Ice cream meets great guitar solos? It was genius, and Ben immediately began creating the iconic concoction. Cherry Garcia debuted in 1987 and quickly became one of our top three most popular flavours. In fact, the first eight pints went straight to Mr. Garcia himself and were met with two thumbs up! As for the fan who sent in the anonymous postcard? Our sleuths finally found her and thanked her with a trip to Vermont and a year’s supply of Ben & Jerry’s ice cream. It’s been a long, strange trip ever since, but what remains is Ben & Jerry's commitment to producing the best responsible ice cream. Like all of our flavours, Cherry Garcia is made with 1% Canadian milk, free run eggs, Non-GMO, and Fairtrade certified cocoa and vanilla. The milk and cream is kosher-certified and comes from Canadian cows. Responsibly sourced packaging gets the goodness from our factory to your freezer.

product_name: Vadilal Falooda Ice Cream 1 Ltr/33.8 fl.oz., Vadilal Falooda Ice Cream
short_description: Indulge in the delightful taste of America’s #1 Indian ice cream brand, now available in Canada! This exquisite treat brings the rich culinary heritage of India right to your doorstep. Each creamy spoonful is inspired by the classic Royal Falooda flavor, a beloved dessert known for its luxurious layers of flavors, including rose, saffron, and chewy vermicelli, topped with a medley of nuts. Crafted with care, this ice cream is made from 100% milk and is 100% vegetarian, ensuring that every bite is not only delicious but also of the highest quality. Plus, you can enjoy it guilt-free—it's made without eggs, preservatives, or artificial flavors. The delightful combination of traditional Indian ingredients creates an experience that’s perfect for any occasion—whether you’re enjoying a family gathering or celebrating with friends. Each scoop captures the essence of this iconic dessert, inviting you to savor the indulgent taste of Royal Falooda. This ice cream is not just a dessert; it’s a celebration of flavor and tradition that brings joy with every bite. Treat yourself to this delectable fusion of taste and culture, and discover why this ice cream has captured the hearts of so many. Whether you’re a long-time fan of Indian desserts or trying it for the first time, this delightful flavor promises to satisfy your sweet tooth and leave you craving more. Don’t miss out on this unique flavor sensation—experience the joy of Royal Falooda ice cream today!

short_description: Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream Strawberry Jammin combines sweet cream ice cream, pie crust pieces, white fudge bits, and strawberry jam swirls. Enjoy it with your family, friends, or just keep jammin to your heart's content by yourself, either way, this exciting new flavour will be like music for your taste buds. Our thoughtful Ingredients support positive change and make our ice cream taste sensational! Ben and Jerry's ice cream is proudly made with Fairtrade certified ingredients like bananas, coffee, cocoa, sugar, and vanilla. Our ice cream also uses only milk certified by Dairy Farmers of Canada, non-GMO ingredients, and cage-free eggs from free-grazing hens. This delicious frozen treat is also certified kosher. At Ben & Jerry’s, we believe that business can be a huge catalyst to stand up for justice in society. Through activism, advocacy, and our everyday business activities around the globe, we’re working to deliver justice in all its flavours. At Ben & Jerry's, we are on a three-part mission that aims to create prosperity for everyone connected to our ice cream business: suppliers, employees, farmers, franchisees, customers, & neighbours

product_name: Frostline Vanilla Soft Serve Ice Cream Mix Lactose Free 6 lb
short_description:
Hello there, ice cream enthusiasts!

Do you dream of creamy, dreamy, soft serve ice cream on demand, but can't justify the late-night run to your local ice cream shop? Well, buckle up because we're about to turn your kitchen into a gourmet ice cream parlor. Meet the Frostline 6 lb. Vanilla Soft Serve Ice Cream Mix!

This isn't just an ice cream mix. This is your ticket to creamy, soft, and oh-so-flavorful homemade soft serve that rivals any high-end ice cream shop. Each box is packed with everything you need to create the dreamiest vanilla soft serve you've ever tasted. Just add water, mix, and let your ice cream machine do the rest. But that's not all. Each pack makes a whopping 113 half-cup servings of ice cream. That's right - you could literally have a soft serve party and still have some left over for those late-night cravings. Plus, it's lactose-free, so everyone can indulge without the worry!

short_description: Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core Ice Cream tub has cookie milk ice cream with fudge chips & a chocolate chip cookie dough core. Dough lovers, unite! short_description:
Quickly and easily prepare large batches of soft serve ice cream with the Frostline chocolate soft serve ice cream mix. Delivering a rich chocolate flavor with a creamy mouthfeel, this versatile soft serve mix is delicious on its own or can be used to create an endless number of recipes for your menu. Offering a great base for many mix in options, use it as a foundation for candy add-ins and toppings to serve delicious sundaes or trendy dipped cones. Or, mix with other Frostline soft serve flavors to create customer-favorite twists. In addition to soft serve ice cream, this mix can be used in granita or milkshake machines to make frozen beverages and shakes, including alcohol-infused beverages for your of-age crowd! Use it to create anything from a simple chocolate shake to a boozy chocolate martini. Perfect for ice cream shops, snack bars, and buffets, the mix is low in fat and cholesterol-, gluten-, and lactose-free, allowing you to service a wider variety of diets.

This shelf stable dry mix provides easier handling and storage than ready-to-use fresh dairy and it provides a more consistent flavor and texture from batch to batch. Best of all, preparation is quick and easy to help you keep up with high demand and ensure optimal freshness when serving. Simply fill a clean mixing bucket with 2 gallons (8 quarts) of cold water and add in one bag of Frostline soft serve mix to the bucket. Stir with a wire whisk for approximately 2 minutes or until the dry mix is completely dissolved. Pour the mixture into your commercial soft serve machine or cover and store in your refrigerator. Each bag yields approximately (88) 2/3 cups servings, providing you with an ample supply for your business.

A leader in the frozen shelf-stable frozen treats industry, Frostline is a brand name that is synonymous with quality and great taste. Servicing a wide variety of operations, their product portfolio includes soft serve mixes, frozen yogurt mixes, and frozen beverage mixes, and their selection of both classic and on-trend flavors offers a delicious option for nearly every customer. The shelf-stable mixes are easy to ship, store, and prepare, resulting in a higher profit margin for your business than traditional dairy mixes without compromising on the creamy taste and texture your customers expect. Providing you with menu versatility and profitability, Frostline frozen treats offer an excellent addition to your establishment!

Suggested Recipe: ChocoLatte Soft Serve

1 bag Frostline chocolate soft serve mix
2 gallons coffee, chilled

Fill a clean mixing bowl with 2 gallons (8 quarts) of chilled coffee and add the Frostline mix into the bucket. Stir with a wire whisk for approximately 2 minutes or until the dry mix is completely dissolved. Pour the mixture into your commercial soft serve machine or cover and store in your refrigerator

product_name: KFFKFF Professional Ice Cream Maker, Output of 10.6 QT/H, 1000W Single Taste Tabletop Soft Serve Ice Cream Device, 4L Reservoir 1.6L Cylinder, Digital Screen Automatic Cleaning Pre-chilling
short_description:
Product Description

KFFKFF Commercial Soft-Serve Ice Cream Machine
Experience the ultimate convenience with this KFFKFF commercial desktop ice cream maker. Designed for efficiency and simplicity, this machine allows you to create high-quality ice cream in just 15 minutes. Equipped with a powerful yet quiet compressor, it boasts a 1.6L capacity and can produce up to 10L of ice cream per hour. Utilizing advanced puffing technology, it ensures smoother ice cream and allows for easy hardness adjustments to cater to individual preferences. Crafted from durable stainless steel, including a food-grade stainless steel cylinder, this machine guarantees longevity and effortless cleaning. 
KFFKFF Countertop Ice Cream Machine
This commercial ice cream maker for your countertop can produce delicious ice cream in just 15 minutes. The powerful compressor operates quietly at less than 66 dB, ensuring a peaceful environment. It has the capacity to continuously deliver 4 to 6 ice cream balls, allowing you to make up to 10L/2.7 gal of ice cream per hour. The result is a perfect smooth and creamy texture that will satisfy your cravings.
KFFKFF Soft Serve Ice Cream
Experience the ultimate soft serve ice cream with our innovative ice cream machine. It features built-in puffing technology that enhances the air contact of the ice cream, resulting in a smoother texture. You can achieve the desired texture by using the hardness adjustment function, allowing you to customize every serving according to your personal preferences. 
KFFKFF Stainless Steel Construction
Crafted with high-grade stainless steel, this ice cream machine offers exceptional durability and ease of cleaning. The 304 food-grade stainless steel cylinder ensures hygiene and longevity in commercial settings. Its rust-resistant properties make it a reliable choice for any ice cream shop or food establishment. 
KFFKFF Optimized Cooling System
Our ice cream machine is equipped with an efficient cooling system that guarantees even cooling and heat dissipation. The high-speed rotating mechanism, along with the built-in copper tube condenser and large area side vents, ensures consistent ice cream texture and firmness. 
KFFKFF Versatile Commercial Use
This ice cream maker is perfect for various commercial venues, including ice cream shops, cafes, burger joints, drink bars, and small food stalls. Its compact size and efficient output make it a valuable addition to any food service establishment. 
KFFKFF Refrigeration and Heat Dissipation
Our ice cream machine features an integrated 1.6L (1.7QT) cooling tank and a fast-rotating triple mixer. This combination creates creamy and silky-smooth ice cream textures, enhancing the overall quality and appeal of the ice cream served. 

Specifications

Item Model Number: BQL-9200ST

Main Material: Stainless Steel 201

product_name: Farmer's Finest Free Range Large Brown Eggs, 12 Count
short_description: Farmer's Finest Free Range eggs are produced by hens that live in cage-free, open concept barns with access to roam outdoors. Access to the outdoors allows the hens to express natural behaviours like scratching, pecking and eating insects.

product_name: Great Value Omega-3 Large White Eggs, 12 count
short_description: For all of the health benefits of omega-3 and vitamin E make Great Value Omega-3 Large White eggs a regular part of your family's diet. Omega-3 fatty acids help to improve heart health by lowering blood pressure, reducing the risk of blood clots and blocked blood vessels. They are also an essential nutrient for healthy growth and development. In particular, DHA omega-3s contribute to eye, nerve and brain development, primarily in children under two years of age. Vitamin E is important for the formation of red blood cells, muscle and other tissues and may help to protect against some cancers. Great Value Omega-3 Large White eggs are packed with omega-3 and vitamin E. They contain 10 times more omega-3 and 4 times more vitamin E than regular eggs. That's because they are laid by hens fed a diet containing flaxseed, a rich source of omega-3 fatty acids.  Add omega-3 and vitamin E to your diet with Great Value Omega-3 Large White eggs.

short_description: We love eggs. We love the way they scramble, the way they fluff, the way they taste better when they’re made from plants. short_description: Schneiders® Hickory Smoked Classic Cut Bacon proves that when it comes to great bacon, there are no shortcuts for time and care. Though bacon seems simple, Schneiders® has put decades of practice into perfecting the craft of this beloved breakfast food. It starts with the highest-quality pork belly, the ideal balance of salt and cane sugar in the brine, and a special mix of North American hickory and applewood for smoking. It is gently hung by hand to ensure it smokes evenly, then sliced nice and thick. Since 1890, Schneiders® brand has established a rich heritage of original and authentic recipes, using premium ingredients and taking all the time needed to honour the origin and inspiration of each recipe. Quality never gets old™.

product_name: McCain® 9 Minute No Flip Potato Patties, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 600g
short_description: Elevate breakfast time with crispy, savoury potato patties in under 10 minutes—no flipping required. McCain® 9 Minute No Flip Potato Patties make it easy to serve up delicious, restaurant-level golden potato goodness straight from your air fryer or oven at home. A satisfying solution for fast-paced mornings, our premium frozen potato patties are a family favourite. Made with specially selected potatoes and simple ingredients, McCain Hashbrowns contain no artificial flavours, hydrogenated oils, trans fat or cholesterol. There’s no need to hover over a hot pan with these no-flip potato patties, simply place them in a single layer in your pre-heated air fryer or oven and they’ll cook up crispy and delicious to a light golden colour in minutes. A versatile morning staple, enjoy these 9-Minute Potato Patties on their own as quick and crispy breakfast treats on busy weekdays or savour as go-to sides in leisurely weekend brunches with friends and family. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 390°F (200°C), arrange frozen patties in a single layer on bottom of basket, air fry for 7-11 minutes to a light golden colour. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen patties in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 9-11 minutes. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Classic Hash Brown Potato Patties, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 20 Pack
short_description: Take breakfast to the next level with McCain® Classic Hash Brown Potato Patties. These convenient hash browns cook up crispy and golden in your air fryer or oven, helping you to create restaurant-quality breakfasts in the comfort of your own home. Made with quality potatoes, McCain Hashbrowns are low in saturated fat and free of trans fat and cholesterol. A convenient meal option to help fuel your day, these frozen potato patties can be enjoyed on their own as easy crispy breakfast treats on busy weekdays or savoured as go-to sides during leisurely brunches on weekends and holidays. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 360°F (182°C), arrange frozen patties in a single layer on bottom of basket, air fry for 11-13 minutes to a light golden colour. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen patties in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 26-30 minutes, turning halfway through. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Savoury Homefries, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 650g
short_description: McCain® Savoury Homefries take a classic diner favourite and elevate it with a subtle coating of garlic, onion, herbs and spices. Crispy, golden, breakfast home fries made from specially selected potatoes are a satisfying way to start any day. Pop them in the oven and bake them or enjoy quick and delicious air fryer home fries in minutes, however you prepare them you’re in for a treat. Our frozen savoury home fries contain no artificial flavours, hydrogenated oils, trans fat or cholesterol, so you can always feel good about sharing these crispy home fries with your friends and family. Enjoy McCain home fries for breakfast on their own, as a savoury side dish, or add them to your favourite bacon and eggs recipes to elevate any brunch menu—there’s no wrong way to enjoy these crispy classics. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 390°F (200°C), fill basket halfway with frozen homefries, air fry for 14-16 minutes to a light golden colour, sliding basket out and shaking halfway through. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen homefries in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 21-25 minutes, turning halfway through. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Potato Pancakes, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 600g
short_description: McCain® Potato Pancakes bring everyone to the breakfast table with a tempting blend of real shredded potatoes and light seasoning. Perfect as a quick and delicious side dish, the secret ingredient in a special brunch recipe, or simply on their own, McCain potato pancakes cook up golden and crispy in your air fryer, on your stovetop, or in the oven. Lightly seasoned with onions and spices for a classic savoury flavour everyone will love, these quick potato pancakes cook up from frozen in as few as 9 minutes, depending on your method of preparation. Made with specially selected potatoes and simple ingredients, these easy potato pancakes contain no artificial flavours, hydrogenated oils, trans fat or cholesterol. Breakfast will never be the same once you add this classic potato dish to the menu. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 330°F (165°C), arrange frozen potato pancakes in a single layer on bottom of basket, air fry for 9-11 minutes to a light golden colour. Pan - Heat a small amount of cooking oil in a non-stick frying pan, add frozen potato pancakes in a single layer, cook on medium-high for 14-18 minutes, turning halfway through. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen potato pancakes in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 18-20 minutes, turning halfway through. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. See full details on packaging.

product_name: Y&Y black glutinous rice, 2 kg
short_description: Immerse yourself in the rich and nutty flavor of Y&Y Black Glutinous Rice, a premium variety of rice that offers a unique culinary experience. Also known as "black sticky rice" or "forbidden rice," this heirloom grain is prized for its striking color, chewy texture, and nutty taste. Whether used in sweet desserts, savory dishes, or as a base for colorful rice bowls, Y&Y Black Glutinous Rice adds depth and sophistication to your culinary creations. Y&Y black glutinous rice. While many whole grains contain gluten, black rice is a nutritious, naturally gluten-free option that can be enjoyed by those on a gluten-free diet. Black rice is naturally gluten-free and can be a good option for those with celiac disease or gluten sensitivity. Black rice is healthy, packed with protein and fiber. Learn how to cook black rice using black sticky rice (black glutinous rice), and make this Southeast Asian sweet dessert. Usage Suggestions: • Desserts: Use black glutinous rice to make traditional Asian desserts such as black rice pudding, sweet rice cakes, or coconut black rice. • Savory Dishes: Incorporate into savory dishes like black rice risotto, rice salads, or stuffed bell peppers for a unique twist on classic recipes. • Breakfast Porridge: Cook black glutinous rice with coconut milk and sweeteners to create a creamy and indulgent breakfast porridge. • Colorful Rice Bowls: Use cooked black glutinous rice as a base for vibrant rice bowls topped with colorful vegetables, proteins, and sauces. Experience the depth of flavor and versatility of Y&Y Black Glutinous Rice in your culinary creations. Whether you're cooking traditional Asian recipes or experimenting with fusion cuisine, this nutrient-rich rice variety is sure to impress with its distinctive taste and beautiful presentation.

product_name: Knorr Chicken Flavoured Fried Rice Rice Cup, 73g Rice Cup
short_description: Looking for a delicious and easy dish? Look no further than Knorr Rice Cups. Savour the flavour of our Knorr Chicken Flavoured Fried Rice Cups – the ultimate blend of convenience and taste. To enjoy perfectly cooked rice infused with Knorr's signature herbs and spices, simply add cold water up to the line on the inside of the cup, give it a stir, microwave for two and a half minutes, and let rest for 3 minutes. Once ready, give the rice cup one more stir and enjoy this tasty rice dish! At Knorr, we're firm believers that good food shouldn't be limited to special occasions. Elevate your family's favourite dishes effortlessly with our easy-to-make Knorr Rice Cups. Knorr Rice Cups have a quarter cup of real vegetables and six to seven grams of protein per serving. Pair Knorr Rice Cups with your choice of protein and vegetables for a dinner your family will love. Knorr believes that good food matters and everyday meals can be just as magical as special occasions. Knorr offers a wide variety of rice and pasta sides, so you can be sure to find flavours your family will love. Our products owe their taste and flavours to the culinary skills and passion of our chefs. Knorr sources high-quality ingredients to create delicious dishes,bouillons, sauces, gravies, soups, and seasonings enjoyed by families everywhere.

product_name: BEN'S ORIGINAL™  Roasted Chicken Flavour Rice Single Serve Cup, Snack or Side, Microwave in 3.5 Minutes, 68 g, BEN ROASTED CHICKEN SNGL SRV CUP 68g
short_description: BEN'S ORIGINAL™ Roasted Chicken Flavour Rice Single Serve Cup is a tasty ready-to-heat microwave rice in a single-serving cup, which is perfect as a quick snack or a convenient side for your busy days. It is made with carefully selected ingredients, featuring flavourful chicken broth. The addition of carrots and herbs enhances its taste, making it an ideal accompaniment to any meal or a delicious snack on its own. This convenient single-serving rice cup is the perfect size for on-the-go meals, offering a quick and easy way to enjoy perfect rice. Its portable size makes it easy for you to enjoy anytime, whether youâ€™re at work, at home, or on the go. Whenever you need a simple addition to your meal this rice is a hassle-free, delicious choice. Simply heat it up in minutes for a satisfying side dish or a hearty base for any meal, making it an ideal choice for busy lifestyles. The preparation is so easy! Just add water and heat in your microwave for 3.5 minutes. Wait around 2 minutes for the rice to tender and cool, stir, and enjoy! See the back of the pack for details of preparation. This rice dish has no artificial flavours or colours. This dish pairs beautifully with any cuisine, making it a versatile addition to your meals. Feel free to experiment with your own recipes, or simply enjoy it straight from the cup.

product_name: Yupik Organic Ancient Black Rice, 1Kg
short_description: Organic Ancient Black Rice is a dark, short grain that was once consumed only by emperors and referred to as “forbidden rice”. We can understand why emperors regarded black rice in such high esteem! Black rice is a super food and the most nutritional of any rice on the market. In fact, black rice contains as many antioxidants as blueberries! That alone has us incredibly excited to bring you this naturally grown, health boosting Organic Ancient Black Rice!Black rice may sound exotic, but the grains can be prepared in the traditional 2:1 ratio. The color of black rice transforms from a rich, satin black to a deeply set purple. Its flavor profile is comparable to that of whole grain rice: a little firmer, nutty, and complex in taste over white rice. Our Organic Ancient Black Rice adds depth of flavor and a pop of color to rice salads, side dishes, and even desserts!

product_name: Aapki Pasand Hamesha Daily Basmati Rice 8lbs
short_description: Enjoy everyday meals with the rich taste of Aapki Pasand Hamesha Daily Basmati Rice. Perfect for curries, pulao, khichdi, or simple steamed rice, it brings consistent quality and authentic flavor to your table.

product_name: Red Keeri Raw Samba Divine Rice (8LB)
short_description:
Red Keeri Raw Samba Rice is a unique variety of rice that is cherished for its small grain size and distinct taste. It is known for being smooth and having a separate taste and aroma, which makes it a preferred choice for many traditional dishes. This variety of rice is unboiled, leaving the grain slightly smaller and therefore lighter than the parboiled version.

Here are some key characteristics and benefits of Red Keeri Raw Samba Rice:

  • High in Fiber: It has a high fiber content, which is beneficial for digestion and maintaining a healthy digestive system
  • Low Glycemic Index (GI): The low GI of this rice makes it a healthier option for those managing blood sugar levels, as it helps in controlling the rise in blood sugar after meals
  • Rich in Nutrients: Red Keeri Raw Samba Rice contains essential vitamins such as Thiamin, Riboflavin, Niacin, and Vitamin E, as well as minerals like Iron and Zinc
  • Distinctive Flavor: Its unique flavor profile makes it suitable for a variety of dishes, including fried rice and biryani, and it pairs well with different cuisines

product_name: Pack of 6 - Tilda Pure Basmati Rice 907 Gram each
short_description: Highest Quality Basmati Rice grown in the foothills of the Himalayas; the best known region in the world for growing Basmati.

product_name: Pack of 4 - Lundberg Organic Basmati Rice - Regenerative Organic Certified Long Grain White Rice, Fluffy & Aromatic, Gluten Free, Resealable 907g Bag
short_description: White Basmati has always been a family favorite for its versatility and pleasant aroma. This long, thin grain is light and won't clump together when cooked, making it a natural fit for curry, stir-fry, salad, pilaf, and dessert recipes that call for distinct kernels with a fluffy texture. Since 1937, Lundberg Family Farms has been growing wholesome, great-tasting rice while tending to soil, air, water, and wildlife as carefully as our crops. Some people say we're a bit unconventional. But doing things our way - sustainably at every step - allows us to make better food for your table while leaving a better world for the next generation. Grown with earth-preserving practices, our 17+ rice varieties are cultivated to maximize the flavor of each tiny grain. Long, short, black, brown, white, red, and blended. Each variety brings something different to the table so you can get creative in the kitchen. Hungry for more? Look for other great-tasting side dishes, rice cakes, snacks, and packaged rice varieties from Lundberg Family Farms.

product_name: Chandni Chowk Sela Basmati Rice 40lb
short_description: Chandni Chowk Sela Basmati Rice is premium extra-long grain Sella basmati rice. Upon cooking the rice grains can elongate to at least twice their original size, and do not stick together or break. It is perfect for cooking Biryani, Zarda & Pulao in large quantities.

product_name: Pack of 4 - Lundberg Organic Short Grain Brown Rice - Regenerative Organic Certified Whole Grain Rice, High Fiber, Gluten Free, Resealable 907g Bag each
short_description: A pantry staple, Short Grain Brown Rice clings together when cooked. Its subtle, nutty aroma and flavor make it perfect for rice bowls and other everyday dishes that call for a soft, supple texture. Plus, it's a rich source of whole grain goodness! product_name: NutriVilla Zaatar Jordanian Extra 200 g (7.1 oz) Medium Shaker
short_description:
I'm probably the only spice you could eat in a teaspoon-full because yes, I am that good!

I have a way of hitting all five flavour points on the tongue, so I go great on a lot of things! Sprinkle me on avocado, labneh, hummus, and yogourt; make a salad dressing or use as pita bread spread with olive oil. Sprinkle me on eggs or your favourite cheese (especially if melted!).

Traditionally, I'm consumed by soaking/dipping the inner part of small pieces of pita bread into extra virgin olive oil, which is then dipped into a bowl/plate full of Zaatar. This allows me to stick to the bread and transforms this plain pita into a divine, scrumptious bite of YUM!

Pro tip: I also taste amazing on roast chicken.

Ingredients: thyme, roasted sesame, sumac, spices, salt, roasted wheat.
Contains: wheat, gluten, sesame.

As an Italian family-owned food company, BARILLA pasta is synonymous with high quality and "al dente" perfection every time. Spaghetti is the most popular pasta shape in Italy. The name comes from the Italian word spaghi, which means "lengths of cord." Spaghetti originates from the south of Italy and is commonly used with tomato sauces, fresh vegetables, or fish. BARILLA Spaghetti pasta is made with non-GMO ingredients.

At BARILLA, we're passionate about pasta. After all, we have been pasta makers since 1877. As an Italian family-owned food company, BARILLA pasta is synonymous with high quality and "al dente" perfection every time. Our spaghetti pasta is made from the finest durum wheat and is non-GMO verified, peanut-free and suitable for a vegan or vegetarian diet. Perfect for twirling in your favorite pasta sauce, too!

product_name: Great Value Spaghettini Pasta, 900 g
short_description: Prepare a delicious and filling meal quickly and easily with Great Value Spaghettini Pasta. Thinner than regular spaghetti, spaghettini pasta offers a delicate texture ideal for refined seafood dishes and light oil-based sauces. The slim dry pasta is made with 100% durum wheat semolina. The pasta cooks to al dente in as little as 7 minutes, making it a great option for a fast weekday lunch or dinner. To cook, bring 1 litre of water to a boil for each 100 grams of pasta and add 1 tablespoon of salt. Add dry pasta and cook uncovered for 7 to 9 minutes or until desired tenderness is reached. Drain pasta and serve immediately with your favourite sauce. The Ingredient Wise symbol appears on products made without these ingredients: synthetic colours, artificial flavours and sweeteners, hydrogenated vegetable oil, monosodium glutamate.

product_name: Barilla 12 oz. Gluten-Free Spaghetti Pasta - 12/Case
short_description: Create a diet-inclusive menu for patrons with food allergies with this Barillagluten-free spaghetti pasta. This versatile pasta cut's smooth texture pairswell with hearty tomato sauces, fresh vegetables, cheese, & fish. Use it toserve Italian-American staples like spaghetti & meatballs or to offer rusticItalian dishes like spaghetti alla carbonara or spaghetti alla puttanesca. Its classic flavor & texture makes it easy to useinterchangeably with traditional pasta in your recipes, making it a greatoption to have as an option in your cafeteria's pasta bar or a menu upgrade atyour restaurant. To prepare, use 4-6 quarts of water per pound of pasta. Bringto a rolling boil & add salt to taste. Add the pasta to the boiling water,stir gently, & return to a boil. For "al dente" pasta, boil uncovered for 10minutes, stirring occasionally. For more tender pasta, boil for an additionalminute. Remove from the heat & drain well. Simply add your preferredingredients, plate, & serve!In 1877, Pietro Barilla opened a bread & pasta shop in Parma, Italy with thedream of supplying his community with the most delicious handmade bread andpasta to serve at their own family tables.

Urad dal is skinned black lentils or split black gram, which are rich in protein, dietary fiber, and various nutrients. Urad flour is often used as a key ingredient in Indian dishes such as dosa (a type of savory crepe), idli (steamed rice cakes), vada (fried lentil fritters), and various snacks and sweets. It adds a distinctive flavor and texture to dishes and is a popular ingredient in vegetarian and vegan cooking due to its nutritional benefits.

product_name: P.A.N. White Corn Meal - Pre-cooked Gluten Free and Kosher Flour for Arepas, 1 Kilogram (35 Ounces / 2 Pounds 3.3 Ounces) (Pack of 3)
short_description:
Delicious arepas can now be your specialty! Harina P.A.N. is one of the most popular brands of corn flour. Versatile and perfect for a wide range of
dishes such as arepas, empanadas, cornbread, bollos, hallacas, pupusas, tamales to mention just a few.

P.A.N. pre-cooked corn meal is a unique product made out of pure corn. Gluten-free and does not contain any preservatives, artificial colors or flavorings.
The production process is chemical free. Just by adding water, P.A.N. makes instant corn dough, creating a variety of delicious and easy corn based dishes
that can be adapted to different tastes and customs.

How to Prepare the Dough
Preparing the dough is an easy process:
- Pour 2 ½ cups of water into a container.
- Add salt and gradually mix in 2 ½ cups of corn meal.
- Briefly knead the mixture until a smooth dough is formed and then let it rest for 3 minutes.

How to Prepare Arepas
Separate dough in 10 pieces. Take one portion in your hands and shape it into a ball, then press it with your palms to form a large patty shape of about 10 cm
or 3 ½ inches in diameter. Place onto a griddle or frying pan over medium heat for 5 minutes on each side, or until brown on both sides, and serve hot.
Open the arepa and fill it with cheese, ham, eggs, salad or anything else you might put in a sandwich.

About us

The product was intended to bear a name that represented all that an arepa meant, which is that it was to be the "Venezuelan bread" or "pan" in Spanish.
It was thus that it came be called P.A.N., acronym for Productos Alimenticios Nacionales.

On December 10, 1960 P.A.N. was launched and achieved great success, from a complete satisfaction of the Venezuelan consumer.

Today, P.A.N. is found in more than 60 countries, bringing the delicious flavor of corn to consumers in an easy and practical way to prepare their favorite
corn based recipes.
  • THE MOST POPULAR WHITE CORN MEAL - Pre-cooked white corn meal P.A.N. from Empresas Polar is made with 100% selected White Corn which allows to obtain a soft dough ideal for the preparation of traditional Latin-American dishes. It has become one of the most popular and cherished brands of pre-cooked cornmeal
  • EASY TO PREPARE - Our white corn meal is pre-cooked, meaning your delicious meals will take less time to be ready! Just by adding water, P.A.N. makes instant corn dough, creating a variety of delicious corn based dishes. It can be cooked on a cast iron pan, grill, arepa maker, arepa toaster, griddle or oven. Cook it without oil for a fat free version! Keep in a clean, dry place
  • GET READY FOR CREATIVE AND TRADITIONAL MEALS - Perfect to prepare a substitute for bread in a latino brunch and main ingredient for Venezuelan, Colombian or Mexican recipes such as crisp arepas, arepas dulces (sweet arepas), cornbread, corn pancakes, empanadas, tortillas, polenta, galletas (corn cookies), hallacas venezolanas, milho frito, corn chips, and more!
  • KOSHER, HALAL, 100% GLUTEN FREE - Gluten Free, without preservatives, artificial colors or flavorings. Ingredients: pre-cooked white corn enriched with Vitamin D, Calcium, Iron, Potassium, Thiamin, Riboflavin, Niacin, Folate.

short_description:
Bring the authentic taste of Latin America to your kitchen with PAN White Corn Meal, Pre-Cooked Gluten-Free & Kosher Flour for Arepas, 2.26kg/5lbs! This premium pre-cooked white corn meal from P.A.N., a trusted brand since 1960, is made from 100% selected white corn, delivering a soft, versatile dough for traditional dishes like arepas, empanadas, cornbread, and tamales.   • 2.26kg/5lbs Capacity: Large bag yields multiple servings, ideal for bulk cooking or professional use.
  • 100% White Corn: Pre-cooked for a soft, pliable dough, perfect for arepas and more.
  • Gluten-Free & Kosher: Certified gluten-free and kosher (Star-K-Parve), suitable for diverse diets.
  • No Additives: Free of preservatives, artificial colors, or flavors for pure, natural taste.

product_name: Rusingo Dosa Batter 900g
short_description: Prepare authentic South Indian dosas effortlessly with Rusingo Dosa Batter. This ready-to-use batter is crafted to give you the perfect blend of taste and texture, ensuring crisp, golden dosas every time. Made with natural ingredients and no added preservatives, Rusingo Dosa Batter brings the traditional flavor of homemade dosas to your kitchen, making it a convenient choice for busy households. Key Features: Natural Ingredients: Made with high-quality rice and urad dal, ensuring a healthy and delicious meal. No Added Preservatives: Enjoy the natural taste and goodness without any artificial additives. Convenient and Ready-to-Use: Saves you time and effort, allowing you to prepare dosas quickly and easily. Perfect Texture: Ensures crisp and golden dosas with a soft, fluffy interior every time. Versatile: Ideal for making a variety of South Indian dishes like dosas, uttapams, and paniyarams. Cultural Significance: Dosas are a staple in South Indian cuisine, loved for their versatility and delightful taste. Whether enjoyed as a breakfast dish, a snack, or even dinner, dosas are cherished for their crisp texture and savory flavor. Rusingo Dosa Batter allows you to experience the authenticity of traditional dosas without the lengthy preparation process, making it a favorite choice for dosa enthusiasts. Cooking Tips: To make perfect dosas, heat a non-stick pan or a traditional cast-iron tava, and spread a ladleful of Rusingo Dosa Batter in a circular motion. Drizzle a little oil around the edges and cook until golden brown. Serve hot with chutney, sambar, or your favorite side dish. For a variation, try making uttapams by adding chopped vegetables to the batter before cooking. Why Choose Rusingo Dosa Batter? Rusingo Dosa Batter stands out for its commitment to quality and natural ingredients. With no added preservatives, you can enjoy the authentic taste of dosas just like homemade. This batter offers convenience without compromising on flavor, making it an excellent choice for anyone who loves South Indian cuisine but has a busy lifestyle. Bring the taste of South India to your home with Rusingo Dosa Batter and enjoy the delicious, crispy dosas that your family will love.

product_name: Rogers Fine Granulated White Sugar, 4kg Bag – Pure Cane Sugar for Baking, Cooking & Beverages
short_description:
Elevate your culinary creations with Rogers Fine Granulated Sugar Bag, 4KG! Sourced from natural cane sugar, this finely granulated sugar is meticulously refined in Canada to ensure purity and consistency. Its small, fine crystals dissolve quickly and evenly, making it an ideal choice for baking cookies, cakes, and breads, or sweetening beverages like coffee and tea. Perfect for home cooks, professional bakers, or small food service operations, this 4KG single-unit bag offers a convenient, resealable package to keep sugar fresh and free from moisture. Add a delicate, sweet touch to your recipes with this high-quality, all-natural sweetener.
 
Key Features
  • 4KG Single Bag: Generous size for home or small-scale commercial use, yielding numerous servings.
  • All-Natural Cane Sugar: Never bleached, derived from cane plants for pure sweetness.
  • Fine Granulated Texture: Small crystals prevent caking and dissolve easily for baking and cooking.
  • Versatile Use: Ideal for desserts, breads, beverages, sauces, and frostings.
  • Canadian-Made: Refined by Rogers Sugar Inc., ensuring consistent quality and purity.
  • Resealable Packaging: Multiwall paper bag keeps sugar fresh and protected from moisture.
Why Choose This ItemThe Rogers Fine Granulated Sugar Bag, 4KG is a kitchen essential for its natural purity and versatile performance, making it perfect for both sweet and savory recipes. Its fine texture ensures smooth incorporation into batters, doughs, or beverages, while the cane sugar origin delivers a clean, delicate sweetness without artificial additives. The 4KG single-unit size is ideal for frequent bakers or small restaurants, offering value and convenience with resealable packaging. Customers praise its ability to create tender doughs and golden crusts, making it a reliable staple for anyone seeking consistent, high-quality results.
 
Preparation & Serving Details
  • Usage Instructions: Use as needed in recipes—no preparation required; measure directly from the bag for baking, cooking, or sweetening beverages.
  • Serving Suggestions: Perfect for baking cookies, cakes, or breads; sweeten coffee, tea, or lemonade; use in frostings, sauces, or homemade jams.
  • Serving Size: 1 tsp (4g) per serving; the 4KG bag yields approximately 1,000 servings.
  • Storage: Store in a cool, dry place in the resealable bag to maintain freshness and prevent clumping.

short_description:
Discover the exceptional quality of Rogers Sugar Granulated Fine, the perfect choice for all your baking and sweetening needs. This finely granulated sugar is meticulously refined in Canada to ensure purity and consistency. With its fine texture and delicate sweetness, it's ideal for use in a wide range of recipes, including cakes, cookies, pastries, beverages, and more. Whether you're a professional baker or a home cook, this bulk pack of 44.09 pounds will keep you well-stocked for all your culinary creations.

Key Features:

  • Premium Quality: Meticulously refined white granulated sugar for superior taste and performance.
  • Fine Texture: Delivers a smooth and even sweetness to your recipes.
  • Versatile Use: Perfect for baking, cooking, sweetening beverages, and more.
  • Canadian Refined: Made with care in Canada for exceptional quality and purity.
  • Certified Kosher: Suitable for kosher diets and religious observances.
  • Vegetarian-Friendly: Ideal for vegetarian and vegan diets.
  • No Additives: Contains no artificial colors or flavors for a pure sweet taste

product_name: Bossen 4.4 lb. Brown / Black Sugar Crystal Boba
short_description: This Bossen brown / black sugar crystal boba offers an easy way to create trendy bubble teas or add tantalizing texture to your signature beverages or frozen yogurt! Also known as agar boba, this crystal boba is made from konjac, a plant native to eastern Asia, to create chewy, jelly-like pearls that are sweetened with a syrup flavored with brown / black sugar. Aside from using this product to create trendy bubble tea, you can also use these boba to add volume and value to other menu offerings like smoothies and shaved ice, or use them as a topping for frozen yogurt! They're a fun addition to any number of cold beverages and desserts. Unlike traditional tapioca boba pearls, these crystal boba don't require any cooking or preparation to reach their 10 mm diameter, making them easy to add to an assortment of recipes without extra work. Simply separate the crystal boba with a scoop before serving for best results. To maintain this product's freshness, it's recommended that you refrigerate after opening, store in an air-tight container, and consume within 2 weeks. In order to keep your establishment in good supply, this large 4.4 lb. bag contains approximately (20) 100g / 4 tbsp. servings of crystal boba! Since 2010, Bossen has specialized in creating premium boba products and fun Asian eats. They supply a diverse line of trendy offerings to satisfy the sweet tooth of any customer, from milk teas and Taiwanese-style snow ice to Bursting Boba pearls and frozen yogurt toppings! Explore Bossen's deliciously different products to find the perfect addition to your specialty drink menu.

product_name: Swerve - Brown Sugar, 340g
short_description:
Make life a little sweeter with Swerve’s Brown Sugar! A natural sweetener without artificial ingredients. Just like sugar with zero calories! Sweet deal, right?

Key Information

  • Zero-calorie natural sweetener
  • Diabetes-safe
  • Measures, bakes, and cooks like sugar
  • Low glycemic index
  • Delicious flavour with no bitter aftertaste

Product Overview

Sweet tooth giving you grief? Make the switch to Swerve’s Brown Sugar! A delicious sweetener made from naturally sourced ingredients, it’s the perfect sugar alternative.

We know that sugar can wreak havoc on our bodies. Thankfully, Swerve’s Brown Sugar avoids a lot of those problems; it has little to no effect on blood glucose and insulin levels!

It’s derived from sweet, non-digestible carbohydrates found in certain starchy root vegetables and fruits.

With no artificial ingredients, flavourings, or preservatives and containing gut-friendly prebiotic fibre, it’s a fantastic choice for carb-conscious consumers.

When you hear it tastes just like sugar, bakes just like sugar, and even caramelizes just like sugar, you’ll realize that the sweetest dreams are made of Swerve!

Ingredients

Erythritol, Oligosaccharides, Vegetable Glycerin, Fruit Juice Concentrate (For Colour), and Natural Flavours.

Frequently Asked Questions

Oh no! My Swerve Brown Sugar has gone hard and clumpy. How do I fix this?

No need to worry, this happens sometimes! Swerve products can be a little sensitive to environmental factors like humidity and heat. It’s best to store it in a cool, dry place. If you’ve noticed that it is beginning to clump, popping it in the freezer can undo the effect the moisture has had on it.

Need it ready for action faster? You can pop it in a food processor and blitz or into the microwave for a few seconds (Swerve recommends 30 seconds).

product_name: Napoleon's Celtic Salt - Celtic Salt Organic 82 Minerals Coarse, 1/2lb Resealable Bag, Naturally Moist, Hand Harvested, Unrefined from France, 100% Natural, 0.5lb French Grey
short_description: Embark on a culinary journey with Napoleon's Celtic Salt, where nature's rhythm and the salt worker's expertise converge. Twice a day, as the high tides embrace the marshes, the salt worker skillfully opens a valve, allowing the open sea's water to flow into the primary pond, 'vasière.' Guided by the sun, wind, and the artisan's mastery, the water gracefully evaporates, culminating in the crystallization ponds, 'oeillets.' Witness the enchanting metamorphosis as a simple drop of water transforms into a tiny grain of salt. With 84 trace minerals, your body will thank you. Elevate your culinary creations with this captivating process captured in every crystal of Napoloen's Coarse Grey Salt. While most companies will harvest and artificially dry their salt to less than 1% moisture. We naturally dry our salt in the sun to 10% moisture. This unique feature of our salt, allows all the minerals to remain in the salt to your benefit. Making the salt much more balanced than traditional sea salts. This product includes highlights of being 100% Organic, Certified Kosher, Gluten Free, Vegan, Paleo-Friendly. Product of France.

product_name: Pride of India- Himalayan White Salt Fine Grind 1 lbs (453.59 gm)- Rarest & Enriched W/84+ Natural Minerals- Low Sodium- Mineral Rich Nutrition and Enhanced Taste- Healthier Table Salt Substitute
short_description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of gastronomy with our Himalayan White Salt Fine Grind. Sourced meticulously from ancient salt deposits nestled deep within the pristine Himalayan ranges, this exquisite salt boasts a journey that spans millennia. Carefully selected and finely ground, each crystal encapsulates the untamed purity of nature, delivering a taste that is at once subtle and profound. With its delicate composition of trace minerals, including potassium, calcium, and magnesium, our Himalayan White Salt transcends ordinary seasoning to become an elemental masterpiece that enriches your culinary creations. Whether sprinkled over a freshly grilled steak to draw out its natural flavors, delicately incorporated into a vibrant salad dressing, or used as a finishing touch on gourmet dishes, the fine grind of this salt ensures a seamless blend that elevates every bite. Its distinct white hue and soft texture offer a feast for the eyes and palate alike, while its unaltered composition provides a health-conscious choice for the discerning epicurean. Allow the legacy of the ages to infuse your dishes as you embark on a sensory journey with our Himalayan White Salt Fine Grind—a testament to nature’s artistry and the embodiment of flavor in its purest form.

product_name: Eupherbia Blue Salt, Coarse, Rare Mineral Salt, High Potassium, Lower Sodium, 100g (3.5 oz)
short_description:
The Nutritious Blue Choice!
Blue salt, hand-harvested from ancient dried seas, is considered one of the rarest salts in the world. This mineral-rich alternative to table salt is high in potassium and lower in sodium. With a uniquely bold taste and a blueish-grey color, it is a popular choice to elevate dishes or to be used as a garnish.
Blue Salt is a superior option due to its lower sodium content and high potassium levels. With potassium comprising 20% of its mineral content, Blue Salt offers about 30% less sodium compared to other salts, making it a healthier alternative.
The captivating blue color of blue salt comes from potassium chloride naturally integrated into its crystals over millions of years. More than a seasoning, it's a piece of nature's craftsmanship, preserving the charm and benefits of an ancient era.
Tested using advanced FT-IR spectroscopy and microscopic examination by Certified Laboratories - USA, our ancient blue salt is free from microplastics and foreign matter. Enjoy the pure, exceptional quality of this rare natural wonder.

product_name: Pride Of India - Pure Himalayan Pink Salt - Enriched w/ 84+ Natural Minerals, Medium Grind 2.2 Pound (35.2oz) Jar - Himalayan Salt, Himalayan Pink Salt, Pink Himalayan Salt, Grind Salt, Pure Rock Salt
short_description: Pride of India incorporates naturally-grown food and herbal products from India into our daily life. These all-natural ingredients help enhance the overall health of the human body. Pride of India is family owned and operated, and we manufacture our products in the USA. Our Himalayan Pink Rock Salt is the purest form of salt available on planet Earth because it does not undergo any artificial treatment or refining processes. It is carved out from decades-old, naturally occurring salt reserves at the bed of the giant Himalayan mountains in the Indian subcontinent. The reddish-pink appearance of our pink salt proves its purity. This coarse salt contains up to 84 essential minerals that are quintessential for the human body in daily nutrition. The grainy texture, distinct flavor, and easy solubility of our pink salt make it great for kitchen use as well as in the bath. Pink Himalayan salt contains sodium and other electrolytes that can help balance electrolytes, regulate hydration, balance PH levels. Commercial table salt contains between 97.5% and 99.9% sodium chloride, while Himalayan sea salt only contains about 87%. Additionally, many table salts go through a bleaching process and may even contain harmful ingredients. Our Himalayan salt, however, is natural and doesn’t go through a refining process. Pink salt can be used in salt lamps, as a salt substitute, in bath scrubs, or as a bath salt. It’s also a superior substitute for table salt. Use a pinch in your favorite recipe

Gordon Pure White  Vinegar Bulk Large 5L
short_description:
Unlock endless possibilities with Gordon Choice Pure White Vinegar, 5L! This pure, 5% acetic acid vinegar is a kitchen and household staple, offering a tangy flavor for cooking and powerful cleaning properties. Made from simple ingredients, it's perfect for enhancing salad dressings, marinades, sauces, or pickling veggies. Beyond the kitchen, it tackles tough cleaning tasks like unclogging sinks, disinfecting surfaces, and shining chrome. With its generous 5-liter size, it's ideal for families, restaurants, or anyone who appreciates dependable value in a versatile product.
 
Key Features
  • 5L Capacity: Large jug for bulk use, yielding hundreds of servings or cleaning applications.
  • 5% Acetic Acid: Provides the perfect balance for tangy flavor and effective cleaning power.
  • Natural & Pure: Free from additives, making it a clean choice for food and home use.
  • Versatile Applications: Great for cooking, pickling, cleaning, and disinfecting.
  • Eco-Friendly: A natural alternative to chemical cleaners, safe for wooden surfaces and stainless steel.
  • Long Shelf Life: Stable at room temperature, ensuring lasting freshness and value.
Why Choose This ItemThe Gordon Pure White Vinegar is a go-to for its reliability and multi-purpose benefits, combining culinary enhancement with household cleaning in one bottle. Its 5% acetic acid strength delivers tangy flavor to dressings and marinades while effectively disinfecting and shining surfaces without harsh chemicals. The 5L size offers exceptional value for bulk users, reducing trips to the store and waste. Customers love its natural purity and versatility, making it a staple for eco-conscious homes, busy kitchens, or professional settings. Plus, it's a budget-friendly way to handle everything from pickling to unclogging sinks.
 
Preparation & Serving Details
  • Culinary Preparation: Mix with oil, herbs, and spices for salad dressings; use in marinades for meats or veggies; add to sauces for tang.
  • Cleaning Instructions: Combine with baking soda and hot water to unclog sinks; spray on chrome or stainless steel for a streak-free shine; disinfect cutting boards by soaking in vinegar.
  • Serving Size: Use 1–2 tbsp per serving for dressings or marinades; for cleaning, dilute as needed (e.g., 1:1 with water for sprays). A 5L jug provides hundreds of uses.
  • Storage: Store at room temperature in a cool, dry place. Keep tightly capped to maintain potency.

short_description: Kikkoman® Less Sodium Soy Sauce is brewed exactly the same way as all-purpose Kikkoman Soy Sauce. Although there is less sodium in Less Sodium Soy Sauce, all the flavor and quality characteristics remain because it is aged before extracting the salt. However, to maintain this full umami flavor, we recommend using it during the latter stage of cooking in braising sauces, soups and stews, vegetables or stir-frys.

product_name: Lee Kum Kee 1/2 Gallon Less Sodium Soy Sauce - 6/Case
short_description: With this Lee Kum Kee less sodium soy sauce, your patrons can enjoy the classic Asian flavor they know and love without compromising their commitment to healthy eating! This naturally-brewed soy sauce is made according to a traditional recipe to offer a deep reddish-brown color and a rich, umami flavor, even without the extra salt. With just 600 mg of sodium per serving, this less sodium version is approximately 40% lower in sodium than Lee Kum Kee's premium soy sauce! Packaged in a bulk 1/2 gallon bottle with a convenient handle, this less sodium soy sauce is a perfect way to ensure that your Asian restaurant remains well-stocked with the essentials. Your health-conscious patrons will appreciate having this lower sodium option available for use. Plus, this product is made with non-GMO soybeans and contains no artificial flavorings, making it a natural choice for your establishment. Soy sauce is one of the world's oldest condiments and it has a long history of adding delicious flavor to a wide variety of Asian dishes! It brings deeply savory, salty taste to classic Asian dishes and fusion dishes alike. Use this soy sauce in your kitchen to flavor stir frys, noodle dishes, Japanese shoyu ramen, and a whole host of other delicious entrees. It's also a great addition to marinades for meats, fish, vegan proteins like tofu and tempeh, or vegetables. Try blending it with oil and spices like garlic, ginger, and chili to make delicious dressings to add to finished dishes! This less sodium soy sauce can also be used to refill tabletop containers for your patrons to use as a condiment for their meals. It makes a perfect dip for practically any variety of sushi, as well as for meats and bite-sized appetizers. Invite your patrons to drizzle this soy sauce over noodle dishes, stir frys, or fried rice to allow them to adjust the flavor to their liking.  While running a humble tea and oyster soup shop in Guangdong, China, Lee Kum Sheung had a happy accident; one day in 1888, he simmered his oysters for too long. His normally clear oyster soup had turned into a thick brown sauce with a rich aroma and an astonishingly complex flavor. Lee knew he had accidentally made something wonderful! He created the Lee Kum Kee brand to promote his newly-invented oyster sauce, and as the sauce's popularity began to grow, so did his company. Though today, Lee Kum Kee is an international brand that is well-known throughout China and around the world, this family-owned business has remained rooted in its beginnings as a simple company founded on delicious flavor. Lee Kum Kee offers a wide variety of traditional Chinese sauces and condiments and is constantly creating innovative new flavors that set the standard for great taste. Whether you're looking for authentic Chinese flavor or delicious condiments to help you keep up with industry trends, Lee Kum Kee offers something for every establishment.

Made from premium soybeans & freshly-milledwheat flour, this soy sauce is brewed using traditional methods in order tocreate a dark reddish-brown color & a deeply umami, salty flavor. Packagedin a bulk 5 gallon container, this premium soy sauce is a perfect way toensure that your Asian restaurant remains well-stocked with the essentials.Plus, this product is made with non-GMO soybeans & contains no artificialcolorings or preservatives, making it a natural choice for your establishment.Soy sauce is one of the world's oldest condiments & it has a long history ofadding delicious flavor to a wide variety of Asian dishes! It brings deeplysavory, salty taste to classic Asian dishes & fusion dishes alike. Use thissoy sauce in your kitchen to flavor stir frys, noodle dishes, Japanese shoyuramen, & a whole host of other delicious entrees. It's also a great additionto marinades for meats, fish, vegan proteins like tofu & tempeh, orvegetables. Try blending it with oil & spices like garlic, ginger, & chilito make delicious dressings to add to finished dishes! This premium soy saucecan also be used to refill tabletop containers for your patrons to use as acondiment for their meals. It makes a perfect dip for practically any varietyof sushi, as well as for meats & bite-sized appetizers. Invite your patronsto drizzle this soy sauce over noodle dishes, stir frys, or fried rice toallow them to adjust the flavor to their liking.While running a humble tea & oyster soup shop in Guangdong, China, Lee KumSheung had a happy accident; one day in 1888, he simmered his oysters for toolong.

product_name: Lee Kum Kee 5.3 lb. Sushi Unagi Sauce
short_description: Take the prep work out of serving traditional Japanese sauces with thisdelicious, ready-to-use Lee Kum Kee sushi unagi sauce. Also known as _unagi notare_ or eel sauce, this classic condiment is made with soy sauce, sugar, andsalted sake rice wine to create a salty sauce with sweet caramelization & abeautiful golden-brown color that's versatile in application. Packaged in abulk 5.3 lb. jar with a convenient handle, this unagi sauce is a perfect wayto ensure that you keep your Asian restaurant well-stocked with theessentials. Plus, it's made without artificial flavors, colors, orpreservatives, making this sauce a natural choice for your establishment.Unagi sauce is a traditional accompaniment to Japanese grilled unagi (eel) orunagi sushi. It also makes a delicious dip for many varieties of sushi,including nigiri, shrimp tempura, or temaki. It also makes a great topping forHawaiian poke bowls. However, unagi sauce isn't limited to sushi! Thiscaramelized condiment can be used as a delicious barbecue sauce that's perfectfor practically any grilled entree, such as meat, fish, tofu, mushrooms, orany vegetable. Just a light coating of this sauce is all you need to addcomplex umami flavor to a whole host of dishes! Try creating a satisfyingfusion entree by marinating a flank steak in unagi sauce with ginger, garlic,chili peppers, & scallions, then grilling to medium rare. No matter how youchoose to use it, this delicious & versatile sushi unagi sauce will adddelicious Japanese flavor to your menu.

product_name: Maille Dijon Originale Mustard, Bulk Food Service Jar 3.78L / 4.18kg – Classic French Mustard
short_description:
Bring classic French flavour to every station with Maille Dijon Originale Mustard (3.78L)—a smooth, creamy premium French Dijon mustard trusted by chefs since 1747. The bulk Dijon mustard for foodservice format delivers consistent tang and gentle warmth that blends cleanly into dressings, marinades, glazes, sauces, dips, and sandwich spreads.

Crafted from simple ingredients—water, mustard seeds, vinegar, salt, citric acid, sodium metabisulfite (to protect quality)—it offers a balanced profile that complements meats, fish, vegetables, and grains without overpowering them.

This restaurant-size Dijon mustard is gluten-free, contains no artificial colors or flavors, and is kosher certified in foodservice listings, making it a reliable back-of-house staple. Whether you’re prepping for backyard BBQs and patio parties, camp kitchens, or high-volume service, the 3.78 L jar provides efficiency and value without compromising Maille’s signature texture and finish.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Bulk value (3.78 L): Designed for restaurants, catering, and high-volume prep.

  • Authentic Dijon heritage: Maille’s traditional recipe and silky finish since 1747.

  • Clean, versatile profile: Tangy, gently warming; emulsifies beautifully in vinaigrettes and sauces.

  • Dietary friendly: Gluten-free, no artificial colors or flavors, kosher.

  • Simple ingredient deck: Water, mustard seeds, vinegar, salt, citric acid, sodium metabisulfite.

Use Cases & Applications

  • Vinaigrettes & cold prep: Greens, grain bowls, potato salad, slaws.

  • Hot line & sauces: Pan sauces for chicken, pork, mustard cream, deglazes.

  • Marinades & glazes: Salmon, sausages, ribs, roasted vegetables.

short_description: For a great tasting alternative to traditional mayonnaise made from 100% plant-based ingredients, Hellmann's Vegan Dressing & Spread is all you need to turn what looks like an everyday meal into an epic vegan dish. Turn nothing into something, with just a bit of creativity and a dollop of our sauce. Hellmann's vegan mayonnaise type dressing can help you transform your meals into something truly delicious, and with this 4-pack you'll have more deliciousness to spread. Enjoy the unmistakably amazing taste of Hellmann's Vegan Dressing, knowing that it's packed with quality ingredients in a certified vegan recipe with no compromise on taste or texture. Free from trans fat and low in saturated fat, as well as being gluten-free and a good source of omega-3 polyunsaturates, this vegan mayo type dressing is the perfect condiment for vegan burgers, fries and sandwiches that you can feel good about serving to your friends and family. We've removed the eggs, but not the original taste you love about our spread. Did you notice the slightly darker tint of our bottles? That's because they are now made from 100% recycled plastics and are recyclable. Our better plastics practices can save approximately 14 million plastic bottles from being used every year. There is no denying that food waste is a huge problem. Our goal is to show that ingredients commonly left-behind in the back of your fridge can be transformed into something new. With Hellmann's, you can create exciting dishes with real taste for less waste. #maketastenotwaste

product_name: Heinz 1.5 Gallon Mayonnaise Dispenser Pouch with Fitment - 2/Case
short_description: Use this Heinz mayonnaise to bring just the right amount of creamy, tangyflavor to your signature foods. Featuring a balanced taste and creamy,spreadable texture, this mayonnaise offers a convenient, versatile addition toyour high-volume operation. Spread onto sandwiches, use as an ingredient inyour egg, chicken, and tuna salads, or substitute for butter on your grilledcheese to achieve a crispy, golden crust. It's also great for mixing withother ingredients like ketchup, sriracha, herbs, and seasonings to creaturesignature sandwich spreads or dipping sauces for vegetable platters.    Best of all, this mayonnaise comes ready to use in a compatible pump dispenser(sold separately) and each bag features a connecting tube for easyinstallation. Keep it in the kitchen to use as an ingredient or place in thefront-of-the-house for customers to use as they please. Not only will thisdispenser pouch help ensure convenient, mess-free application and reduceproduct waste, it can also offer hands-free condiment dispensing for yourpatrons to increase the safety and sanitation of your establishment.    The Heinz company started in 1869, when H.J. Heinz began selling bottledsauces, pickles, horseradish, and vinegar. As their products gainedpopularity, Heinz rapidly expanded its portfolio to introduce products likeits world-famous ketchup and steak sauce. Heinz takes great care in producinghigh quality ingredients, including using their own proprietary blend of Heinztomato seeds to make their delicious ketchup. Heinz products have been a partof America's mealtimes as a savory topping, tangy dipping sauce, or recipeingredient and has been a trusted name among consumers for generations.Bringing you reliable performance with unrivaled taste, Heinz products aresure to become pantry staples in your establishment!

product_name: Walden Farms Salad Dressing, Italian, 12 fl oz
short_description:
With Walden Farms Italian Dressing, you get a unique blend of herbs and spices, all the flavor and none of the hidden sugar or fat. The perfect touch of the world's finest aged vinegars, fresh ground herbs and spices, triple filtered water and natural flavors makes Walden Farms Italian Vinaigrette incredibly delicious and perfect when trying to eat right.   • Premium Italian Dressing – This great-tasting Italian dressing makes the perfect addition to traditional salads but also tastes great on burgers, chicken, Monte Cristo sandwiches, potato appetizers, and much more.
  • Life a Guilt-Free Lifestyle – Our low-carb salad dressing is 99% sugar and fat free, gluten free, dairy free, and contains less than 3 calories per serving which means you can add it to all your favorite foods without adding in the guilt.
