short_description: With a taste that's cool and tangy, ranch dressing blends the familiar flavors of buttermilk, garlic, onion, and spices. Originally bottled and sold on a dude ranch in California, ranch dressing became known as "ranch style." Now, this rich and creamy sauce is one of the most well-known and loved salad dressings and dipping sauces.

product_name: Great Value Smooth Peanut Butter, 1 kg
short_description:
For a classic treat you can enjoy any time, reach for Great Value Smooth Peanut Butter. Prepared using dry roasted peanuts, this smooth peanut butter delivers that nutty flavour you know and love with a creamy texture that's easy to spread and serves up a delectable finish. Plus, it contains no synthetic or artificial colours, flavours or sweeteners and has only 90 calories and 1 gram of sugar per serving to act as a more mindful snack option. You can enjoy this creamy peanut butter on its own or as a dip or spread with toast, crackers, fruit and more. You can even use it as a base for sauces and marinades or a filling in baked goods and sweet treats to add an unexpected twist.

The Ingredient Wise symbol appears on products made without these ingredients: synthetic colours, artificial flavours and sweeteners, hydrogenated vegetable oil, monosodium glutamate.

product_name: Torani Peanut Butter Flavoring Syrup – 750 mL / 25.36 oz Glass Bottle
short_description:
Dive into the delightful world of Torani Peanut Butter Flavoring Syrup, where the rich and creamy taste of peanut butter meets pure cane sugar for an irresistible flavor experience. Perfect for enhancing beverages and desserts alike, this syrup is a must-have for coffee shops, cafes, and restaurants!

Key Features:

  • Irresistible Peanut Butter Flavor: Experience the authentic taste of creamy peanut butter, adding a nostalgic twist to your drinks and desserts.
  • Made with Pure Cane Sugar: Crafted from high-quality ingredients to deliver a naturally sweet flavor without any artificial additives.
  • Syrup Pump Compatibility: Easily measure and dispense the perfect amount with a .25 oz. syrup pump (sold separately), ensuring no mess.
  • Versatile Usage: Ideal for flavoring coffee, enhancing baked goods, or creating delectable desserts—let your creativity shine!
  • Attractive Easy-Pour Bottle: The elegant glass design not only looks great on your shelves but also allows for smooth pouring.
  • Generous Servings: Each bottle provides 25 1 oz. servings, making it a cost-effective addition to your menu.cost

Benefits:

  • Expand Your Menu: Add a unique flavor to your coffee and dessert offerings, enticing customers with creative options they won’t find elsewhere.
  • Perfect for All Seasons: The beloved taste of peanut butter appeals year-round, whether in summer shakes or winter warmers.
  • Customer Satisfaction: Peanut butter is a favorite flavor, ensuring your customers enjoy a delicious and memorable experience.
  • Streamlined Preparation: Simplify the process of making flavorful drinks and desserts during peak hours with this user-friendly syrup.
  • Create Signature Offerings: Use this syrup to craft unique beverages and desserts that highlight your café's creativity and stand out in a competitive market.

Why You’ll Love It:
With Torani Peanut Butter Flavoring Syrup, you can effortlessly elevate your drinks and desserts. Its creamy, rich flavor is sure to become a favorite among your customers, making their taste buds dance with joy!

Order your bottle today and start creating delicious peanut butter-inspired delights!

product_name: PB&Me Powdered Natural Peanut Butter 453g - Low-Calorie, High-Protein (3/Case)
short_description:
Introducing PB&Me Powdered Natural Peanut Butter - a game-changer in the world of peanut butter! This innovative product comes in a pack of three, each containing 453 g (1 lb.) of pure goodness. PB&Me is not just peanut butter; it's a revolution in flavor and nutrition.

Features:

  1. All-Natural Goodness: PB&Me is made from 100% peanuts, ensuring you get the pure, unadulterated taste of high-quality peanuts in every serving.
  2. Low-Calorie Alternative: Say goodbye to excess calories! Our peanuts are slow-roasted and pressed to remove the oil, resulting in a light flour with a whopping 90% less calories from fat.
  3. No Added Sugar: Enjoy the natural sweetness of peanuts without the need for added sugar. PB&Me is the perfect choice for those seeking a wholesome, sugar-free alternative.
  4. Calorically Smart: With just 23 calories per tablespoon, PB&Me lets you indulge in the rich taste of peanut butter without compromising your calorie goals.
  5. Protein-Packed: Fuel your body with goodness! PB&Me is high in protein, boasting 6 g per serving. It's a delicious and nutritious addition to your daily routine.
  6. Versatile Usage: Whether you blend it into your favorite shakes and smoothies, use it as a spread, incorporate it into gluten-free baking, or simply enjoy it by the spoonful, PB&Me brings versatility to your culinary adventures.

Discover the joy of guilt-free indulgence with PB&Me. Add it to your shakes, spread it on your morning toast, or get creative with gluten-free baking - the possibilities are endless!

 

Découvrez le PB&Me Powdered Natural Peanut Butter - une révolution dans le monde du beurre de cacahuète ! Ce produit innovant est disponible en lot de trois, chacun contenant 453 g (1 lb.) de pure délicatesse. PB&Me n'est pas simplement du beurre de cacahuète ; c'est une explosion de saveur et de nutrition.

A Kerry Foods brand, it prides itself on its commitment to using only real, wholesome ingredients and innovative technology to deliver authentic flavors, textures, and aromas in its products. Get creative with your flavors with DaVinci Gourmet!

product_name: Organic Chyavanprash Jam/ Herbal Jam
short_description: Chyavanprash has an interesting story behind its name: “Chyavanprash is linked to the story of the Rishi Chyvana and the events surrounding his tale. Chyvana devoted a large part of his time to pursuing enlightenment, which eventually attracted the attention of the Devas or Gods. Through their fear of Chyvana’s devotion and the high chance of him being admitted to the Heavenly realms – which they really didn’t want - they attempted to put a stop to his actions by summoning the beautiful nymph Menakā. Menakā quickly sought out Chywana and this is where the story of Chyavanprash really begins. Menakā worked hard to prevent Chyvana from deep meditation, offering beautiful flowers and delicious foods as distractions. After months of this, Chyvana slowly turned his attentions to Menakā’s beauty and kindness, and away from his original goal of enlightenment. It wasn’t long before Chyvana and Menakā were together, though this wasn’t without its problems. Not only was Menakā a lot younger than Chyvana but she was also immortal, which doesn’t make for a great pairing. Chyvana quickly abandoned his practices and set out into the forest to find a way to solve their problem. After preparing an elixir to reverse his aging, Chyvana returned completely rejuvenated. Rather than remaining as an elderly man, he had a much more youthful appearance and a new lease of life. Thanks to this mysterious elixir that we now know to be Chyavanprash, Chyvana and Menakā remained together and went on to, as they say, live happily ever after.”

The name Smucker's is highly recognized in just about any venue, and their premium selection of jams, jellies, and marmalades uphold a tradition of full-bodied flavor, great quality, and value. Try these plastic portion cups in your restaurant, diner, school cafeteria, or convenience store. Their .5 oz. size is perfectly-portioned for a single serving, and your customers can even grab them on the go with their take-out meals.  Grape jelly offers a quick and easy way to enhance menu items with the delectably sweet and subtly tart taste of wholesome fruit! It's the perfect complement to toast, biscuits, bagels, pancakes, and waffles. Rather than buying jellies and jams in bulk jars, these portion cups are easy to serve in caddies on your tabletop or hotel breakfast bar. Bursting with fresh-from-the-vine flavor, the smooth texture and luscious taste of this grape jelly will add just the right amount of satisfying sweetness to your customers' dishes.

product_name: Hello Kitty Grape Jelly Boba- can 310ml case of 24 (Taiwan)
short_description:
Hello Kitty Grape Jelly Boba — a playful, grape flavour-fuelled drink straight from Taiwan, starring popping pearls and crisp aloe vera for a quirky, refreshing sip. It’s the kind of beverage that turns a regular afternoon into a tiny celebration.

The charm isn’t just the Hello Kitty branding; it’s the textural joy. Chewy popping pearls burst with grape flavour as you sip, while the aloe vera pieces give a light, hydrating finish. Sweet, refreshing and outrageously fun, this is bubble tea-inspired magic in a ready-to-drink format that’s perfect for fans of cute branding and great taste alike.

  • Grape flavour popping pearls deliver playful bursts of sweetness
  • Aloe vera adds a refreshing, hydrating crunch
  • Iconic Hello Kitty branding for instant kawaii appeal
  • Bubble tea-inspired flavour profile in a convenient, ready-to-drink format
  • Great for gatherings, study breaks, or simply treating yourself

Ready for a sip-filled adventure? Add to your cart now and bring a dash of whimsy to your day.

310ml can, case of 24.

product_name: Dalmatia 3.3 lb. Sour Cherry Spread
short_description: When your customers indulge in this delicious Dalmatia sour cherry spread,they will be transported into the Pannonian Valley of Eastern Croatia, whereplump sour cherries are overflowing with a desirable tart tang. Each fruit iscarefully inspected by hand to ensure that it is first class before beinggently simmered into a dark, ruby-red color. The result is a pure, deliciousspread that is perfect for adding a touch of sweetness to any dish.    This indulgent spread makes a great addition to the menu of any establishment.Include this sour cherry spread on your cheese plate or charcuterie board; itsdeep sweetness and tangy flavor complement various cheeses, from creamy brieand tangy chevre to a sharp cheddar or nutty edam! Slather this spread on atoasted slice of rye bread with a creamy, earthy Fourme d'Ambert.Additionally, pair with a crispy baguette with a layer of melted edam cheeseand a glass of Riesling. Incorporate this sour cherry spread into homemadesalsas to balance jalapenos or chipotle peppers, and even add it into yoursalad dressing to give a subtly sweet yet sour dimension. At breakfast, foldthis into Greek yogurt or Icelandic skyr, or spread atop hearty wheat muffinsfor a delicious start to the day. Plus, this sour cherry spread makes anexcellent addition to the tops of panna cottas, or as fillings for chocolatecakes and black forest tortes. No matter how you choose to use it, thisDalmatia sour cherry spread is sure to bring the delicious flavor of theMediterranean to your menu!    Since 1995, Dalmatia has been creating sweet and savory spreads for everyoccasion using ingredients that are sourced from farms on the scenic coast ofCroatia. Their aim is to craft delicious products while supporting localfarmers and regional agriculture. Each fruit is inspected by hand before beingcooked into their signature spreads, ensuring that their products are of thehighest quality. Dalmatia's line of spreads is sure to delight your customerswhile taking your baked goods, charcuterie board, or antipasto plate to thenext level!

product_name: Lynch Marmalade Orange Pure 1.5Kg/3.31Lbs (6/Case)-Canadian Made
short_description:
Lynch Pure Orange Marmalade – Bright, Tangy, and Made with Real Fruit

Experience the bold citrus flavor of Lynch Pure Orange Marmalade, crafted with pure concentrated orange juice and chunks of real orange peel for an authentic, tart-yet-sweet taste. This soft, golden spread delivers a deep, vibrant orange flavor, perfect for breakfast spreads, baking, or gourmet glazes.

Why Choose Lynch Pure Orange Marmalade?

Authentic Citrus Taste

  • Chunks of real orange peel provide a delightful texture and zesty bite.

Versatile & Ready-to-Use

  • Perfect for spreading on toast, bagels, and pastries.
  • Enhances baking & cooking – use in marinades, glazes, or desserts.

High-Quality, Small-Batch Craftsmanship

Dietary & Storage Benefits

  • Gluten-free – suitable for a variety of dietary needs.
  • Kosher certified – meets strict quality standards.
  • Shelf-stable – store at ambient temperature for convenience.

Product Specifications

  • Size: 1.5Kg (3.31lbs) per jar
  • Case Quantity: 6 jars per case
  • Storage: Ambient (shelf-stable) – keep in a cool, dry place

Elevate Breakfast & Beyond!

Whether you're spreading it on warm toast, baking into pastries, or glazing meats and desserts, Lynch Pure Orange Marmalade brings a burst of citrus sunshine to every bite. Stock up today for a taste of pure, Canadian-made excellence!

product_name: Mike's Hot Honey Original Bulk Food Service 12 lbs
short_description:
Bring the perfect balance of sweet and heat to your dishes with Mike's Hot Honey Original. Made with 100% pure honey infused with real chili peppers, this all-natural, paleo-friendly honey adds a flavorful kick to everything from pizza and fried chicken to sauces, dressings, and marinades. Free from artificial sugars and preservatives, Mike's Hot Honey offers a deliciously bold, spicy-sweet profile that enhances any meal. Packaged in a convenient 12 lb. jug, this bulk size is ideal for restaurants, caterers, or refilling tabletop bottles in high-volume kitchens.

Key Features:

  • 100% Pure Honey: Made from high-quality, all-natural honey infused with real chili peppers for a perfect balance of sweetness and heat.
  • No Artificial Ingredients: Contains no artificial sugar or preservatives, making it a clean, paleo-friendly option.
  • Versatile Flavor: Adds a sweet and spicy twist to pizza, fried chicken, barbecue, and more. Also great for mixing into sauces, dressings, marinades, and beverages.
  • Bulk 12 lb. Jug: Perfect for back-of-house use in restaurants, catering businesses, or refilling smaller bottles for tabletop service.

Product Specifications:

  • Weight: 12 lb.
  • Ingredients: 100% pure honey infused with chili peppers
  • Preservatives: None (all-natural)
  • Ideal Uses: Topping for pizza, fried chicken, barbecue; ingredient for sauces, dressings, marinades, and beverages

Benefits:

  • Sweet and Spicy Fusion: The combination of pure honey and real chili peppers creates a unique flavor profile that elevates both savory and sweet dishes.
  • Perfect for High-Volume Kitchens: The bulk 12 lb. jug ensures you have plenty of Mike’s Hot Honey on hand to meet the demands of busy kitchens or refill bottles for table service.
  • Versatile Culinary Ingredient: From drizzling on pizza to enhancing sauces, dressings, and marinades, this hot honey is an essential addition to any professional kitchen.
  • Paleo-Friendly and All-Natural: Enjoy the clean, pure taste of honey without any artificial additives or preservatives, making it suitable for a range of dietary preferences.

Ideal For:

  • Pizzerias and Restaurants: The sweet heat of Mike's Hot Honey makes it a perfect topping for pizza, adding a bold flavor twist.
  • Catering and Events: Ideal for catering businesses or large events, where this bulk-sized jug can be used to prepare delicious sauces, dressings, and more.
  • Creative Chefs: Whether you're looking to enhance fried chicken, barbecue, or craft a signature hot honey cocktail, this honey is a versatile, must-have ingredient.

Why Choose Mike's Hot Honey Original Bulk? For a spicy-sweet burst of flavor that enhances both savory and sweet dishes, Mike's Hot Honey Original is the go-to choice for chefs, caterers, and food enthusiasts alike. Infused with real chili peppers, this 100% pure honey adds a unique, all-natural kick to everything from pizza to beverages.

short_description:
Rediscover the timeless taste of Campbell's Tomato Soup, the one you always remember. Perfectly crafted for any occasion, this versatile soup is not just a meal but an essential ingredient for your culinary creations. Whether enjoyed on its own or incorporated into your favorite recipes, Campbell's Tomato Soup delivers a rich, comforting flavor that has stood the test of time.

Key Features:

  • Classic Flavor: The iconic tomato soup taste that you know and love.
  • Versatile Usage: Enjoy it as-is or use it as a base in various recipes.
  • Easy Preparation: Simply reconstitute with water for a quick and delicious meal.
  • Convenient Storage: Shelf-stable and requires no refrigeration, making it perfect for pantry storage.
  • Bulk Supply: Comes in a 1.36LT/0.36 Gallon size, packed 12 per case, ensuring you always have enough on hand.

Make every meal memorable with Campbell's Tomato Soup

Storage and Usage• Min Product Lifespan from Production: 730 Days. Minimum Temperature: 19 Celsius. Maximum Temperature: 26 Celsius.
Marketing Statements
• Easy to prepare: Reconstitute with water
• Versatile: Can be used as-is or as an ingredient
• Easy to store: Shelf stable requires no refrigeration
Culinary Applications
• Serve as an appetizer or as part of a light meal. Excellent for use on soup and salad bars, and serving lines.
Preparation and Cooking Instructions

• For Cream of Tomato, in a 4 quart pot combine one can of soup with one can of milk. Simmer over low heat, stirring often

product_name: Campbell's Condensed Cream of Mushroom Soup 1.36 L/48oz (12 pack)
short_description:
Serve up delicious soup or create classic comfort foods with this Campbell's 50 oz. can of cream of mushroom condensed soup. Featuring a smooth consistency, this soup is made with real cream, earthy mushrooms, and robust garlic for a rich and hearty taste. Its familiar flavor will be a popular addition to the menu of your school, health care facility, restaurant, hotel, or diner! Best of all, this wholesome soup is low in calories per serving, making it a healthy menu item you can feel great about serving. Featuring the classic Campbell's flavor your guests know and trust, this soup is proof that nothing beats the original.

Thanks to its condensed formula and simple preparation, this soup will help to cut down on prep time and labor costs in your kitchen, making it easy for you to get delicious soup to your hungry customers faster. To prepare, simply combine one can of soup with one can of water in a 4 quart pot. Simmer and whisk over low heat until warmed through, then serve! For a creamier end result, combine half portions of milk and water. Once it's heated, simply ladle out portions of soup into a bowl or cup. Pair it with a pack of crackers, garnish it with crunchy croutons, or serve it with a freshly-baked roll or crisp side salad. Keep things simple by offering it a la carte or with half of a sandwich for the perfect lunch combination. Cream of mushroom is also an essential base for a variety of classic comfort foods. Use it to create green bean casserole topped with crispy onions, hearty beef stroganoff, creamy Swedish meatballs, or rich scalloped potatoes. It makes a great addition to casseroles of all kinds, stews, and even gravy!

For more than 150 years, Campbell's has been a trusted name in American households. With humble roots as a wholesale produce distributor, Campbell's made a name for itself when company president John T. Dorrance invented the process of condensing soup, allowing shelf-stable soup to be sold in cans all over the country. Campbell's groundbreaking canned soup drew international attention and earned the company a bronze medal at the 1900 Paris Exposition. This medallion still appears on cans of Campbell's soup to this day! Over the decades, Campbell's has developed new products and acquired new brands, but has remained true to their original mission to bring their customers wholesome, nutritious food that enriches lives. Perhaps that's what has helped Campbell's remain a household name, pop art icon, and trusted brand for more than a century. Browse Campbell's extensive line of foodservice offerings to find delicious solutions for your establishment that carry the Campbell's name your customers know.

product_name: Pack of 6 - Campbell's Condensed Tomato Soup, 284 mL, 4 Count
short_description: Made with 4 tomatoes and no artificial flavours, there’s goodness inside every can of Campbell’s Condensed Tomato Soup. It’s the perfect ingredient for a wide assortment of family favourite recipes and exceptional all on its own.

product_name: Campbell's® Condensed Low Fat Cream of Mushroom Soup, Shelf Stable, 284 mL
short_description: Campbell’s® shelf stable soups were created with one thing in mind – great taste. Campbell’s® Condensed Low Fat Cream of Mushroom Soup is made with real mushrooms, with only 2 g of fat per 250 mL. You can enjoy a bowl or use it to add extra flavour to your favourite recipes. It’s no wonder Campbell’s® Condensed soups have been a pantry staple in kitchens all across Canada for over 80 years.

product_name: Donmar - Beef Soup Base - 4.54kg - Single Pack - Rich Flavor for Soups, Stews, and Gravies (1ct)
short_description:
Elevate your culinary creations with Donmar Beef Soup Base. This single-pack, 4.54kg container provides a generous supply of this rich and flavorful base, perfect for restaurants, caterers, and large-scale food service operations.  



Key Features:


Intense Beef Flavor: Crafted with a concentrated blend of beef stock, spices, and seasonings, this base delivers a deep, savory beef flavor to your dishes.  

Versatile Applications: Use Donmar Beef Soup Base to:Create flavorful soups: Add to water or stock to create a variety of beef-based soups, such as beef broth, beef noodle soup, and French onion soup.  

Enhance stews and braises: Add depth and richness to your favorite beef stews, braises, and casseroles.

Flavor gravies: Use as a base for delicious gravies to accompany roast beef, pot roast, and other meat dishes.

Season sauces and marinades: Add a touch of beefy flavor to sauces, marinades, and dressings.

Convenient Packaging: The single-pack, 4.54kg container provides a large quantity for high-volume food service operations.  

High-Quality Ingredients: Made with carefully selected ingredients, Donmar Beef Soup Base delivers a consistent and reliable flavor experience.  


How to Use:

Soups: Dissolve the base in water or stock according to your desired concentration.

Stews and Braises: Add to stews and braises during the cooking process to enhance their flavor.  

Gravies: Use as a base for making delicious gravies

product_name: Arrezzio Classi Tomato Peeled Whole Pear Heavy 2.84L/96 oz (6/Case)
short_description:
Arrezzio Classi Whole Pear Tomatoes in Heavy Juice: A Culinary Delight

Indulge in the exquisite taste of Arrezzio Classi Whole Pear Tomatoes in Heavy Juice. Crafted from premium pear tomatoes and packed in a rich, heavy juice with added calcium chloride for firmness, these tomatoes elevate your culinary creations to new heights. With their kosher, allergen-free, non-GMO, and Halal certifications, you can enjoy the pure flavor of these tomatoes with peace of mind.

Key Features:

  • Premium Quality: Made from the finest pear tomatoes, these whole tomatoes are carefully selected and packed to preserve their natural flavor and texture, ensuring a delightful culinary experience with every bite.
  • Rich Heavy Juice: Packed in a rich, heavy juice, these tomatoes are bursting with vibrant flavor and moisture, adding depth and richness to your dishes.
  • Added Calcium Chloride: With added calcium chloride, these tomatoes maintain their firmness, providing a satisfying texture that enhances the overall eating experience.
  • Certified Quality: Kosher certified, allergen-free, non-GMO, and Halal, these tomatoes meet the highest standards of quality and dietary requirements, making them suitable for a wide range of culinary preferences.
  • Convenient Packaging: Each case contains six 2.84L/96 oz containers of whole pear tomatoes, providing ample supply for restaurants, catering services, or home kitchens.

Elevate Your Culinary Creations

Arrezzio Classi Whole Pear Tomatoes in Heavy Juice are the perfect ingredient for adding depth and flavor to your favorite recipes. Whether you're making a classic marinara sauce, a hearty stew, or a vibrant pasta dish, these tomatoes provide a delicious foundation that elevates your dishes to gourmet levels.

Perfect for Every Meal

From weeknight dinners to special occasions, Arrezzio Classi Whole Pear Tomatoes in Heavy Juice are a versatile addition to any menu. Whether you're cooking for family, friends, or customers, these tomatoes add a touch of sophistication and flavor to every meal.

Order Now

Experience the premium quality and exquisite flavor of Arrezzio Classi Whole Pear Tomatoes in Heavy Juice. Stock your pantry with this essential ingredient today. Order your 6-case pack now and elevate your culinary creations with the richness of pear tomatoes in heavy juice

Packaging Information
• Six 102-Ounce cans per case
• Non-BPA intent cans
Size and Shape of Product
• Whole peeled Pear tomatoes packed in tomato juice
• Typical red colour
• 102-ounce can, 6.040" x 6.040" x 6.975"
Yield or Serving Size
• 132 - 1/2 cup (130g) servings per case
Servings per Case
• 132
Quality and Format
• Conventional. Not Organic. Not Fire-roasted
• Ready-to-serve convenience and consistency
• Selected from the very best California whole tomatoes and are packed fresh, in-season
Preparation Cooking Instructions
• Heat or cook as required by your recipe.
Handling Instructions
• Optimum dry storage conditions: 50-70°F, 60% relative humidity
Additional Product Information
• Case Dimensions - 18.

product_name: Great Value No Salt Added Dark Red Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Canned Dark Red Kidney Beans with no salt added are a perfect addition to any delicious chili, salads and soups. The satisfying, affordable beans are a great pantry staple, keep a can or two on hand in the kitchen to star in a family meal this week.

product_name: Great Value Six Bean Medley Canned Mixed Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Increase the nutritional value of your recipes with Great Value Six Bean Medley Canned Mixed Beans. This bean medley is low in fat, packed with nutrients and features a healthy blend of legumes, including chickpeas, red kidney beans, black-eyed peas, white beans, Romano beans and baby lima beans to provide a high source of dietary fibre. Convenient and ready-to-use, you can create a canned bean salad that can be enjoyed on its own with light dressing or add it to salads, stews, soups and sauces for hearty snacks and meals.

product_name: Great Value No Salt White Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Help your family fuel up at suppertime with the hearty and affordable goodness of Great Value White Kidney Beans, minus the extra salt. These beans are a great addition to your favourite soup, chili and burrito recipes.

product_name: Great Value Black Turtle Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Whether as a side dish or as part of a salad,  Great Value Black Turtle Beans are an easy and affordable way to add texture and flavour to your meal. Want to spice things up for supper? Try adding a can of Great Value Black Turtle Beans to your family's favourite chili recipe, for a hearty and home-cooked meal.

product_name: Great Value Pinto Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Pinto Beans are flavourful beans that are easy to add to your daily meal plan, providing 8 g of fibre per 175 g serving to your favourite dishes. Use Great Value Pinto Beans in a burrito, paired with brown rice, or in the next pot of chili you make your family.

product_name: Green Giant Cut Wax Beans, 398 ml
short_description: Canadian grown, Green Giant Cut Wax Beans are deliciously tasty, cut in bite-sized pieces and canned quickly to preserve freshness and flavour.

product_name: Heinz Original Beans in Tomato Sauce, Casein-Free, 398mL
short_description: For years, Heinz has proudly provided the highest quality products. Our Heinz Original Beans in Tomato Sauce are no exception! Try these rich, flavourful beans in a hearty sauce for the perfect complement to a variety of meals. Heinz Beans have been proudly prepared in Canada for over 100 years!

product_name: Great Value Dark Red Kidney Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Dark Red Kidney Beans are the perfect beans to perk up your next batch of chili and homemade soups! Each can of Great Value Dark Red Kidney Beans is a welcome affordable addition to keep stocked on your pantry shelves all year long.

product_name: Great Value Navy Beans, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value Canned Navy Beans are hearty and tasty. These classic white beans are easy to prepare as a side dish, or can become the star of the meal in soups, pies and other comforting dishes for your family on chilly days.

product_name: Great Value No Salt Chick Peas, 540 mL
short_description: Great Value chick peas, no salt added, are a healthy, great-tasting, addition to your family meal. Toss them whole for use in salads, serve them in a stir-fry with seasoned vegetables or crush them to make some hummus.

product_name: Stagg Chili Classique Canned Chilli with Beans, 425g
short_description: Stagg Classic Chili loaded with juicy beef, ripe red tomatoes, select red kidney beans and pink beans, chopped onions and the perfect combination of spices and seasonings.

product_name: Heinz Deep-Browned Beans with Pork & Tomato Sauce, Casein-Free, 398mL
short_description: For years, Heinz has proudly provided the highest quality products. Our Heinz Deep-Browned Beans with Pork & Tomato Sauce are no exception! These Deep-Browned Beans with Pork and Tomato Sauce is a traditional bean recipe with a blend of savoury pork in a tangy tomato sauce. Heinz Beans have been proudly prepared in Canada for over 100 years!

product_name: Unico No Salt Added Black Beans, Unico NSA Back Beans 540mL
short_description:
Beans are versatile, nourishing and useful in soups and stews, cooked with meat or without. Great in salads and vegetable dishes.

In addition to protein, beans provide complex carbohydrates, vitamin B, zinc and iron. They are also cholesterol-free, low in fat and high in fibre.

product_name: Grace Dry Pigeon Peas, 540ml Can, Grace Dry Pigeon Peas, 540ml Can
short_description: Grace Dry Pigeon Peas are a versatile and nutritious addition to your pantry, offering a delightful taste and texture that enhances a variety of dishes. These peas are a staple in Caribbean cuisine, known for their rich, earthy flavor and high nutritional value. Whether you're preparing traditional rice and peas, stews, soups, or salads, Grace Dry Pigeon Peas are the perfect ingredient to bring authentic flavor to your meals. Packaged in a convenient 540 ml can, they are easy to use and store, making meal preparation quick and simple. These pigeon peas are not only delicious but also packed with essential nutrients, including protein, fibre, vitamins, and minerals. They are an excellent choice for health-conscious individuals looking to add more plant-based protein to their diet. Grace Dry Pigeon Peas are a natural, wholesome option that supports a balanced and healthy lifestyle.

product_name: Heinz Original Beans with Pork & Tomato Sauce, 398 mL Can, HEINZ BEANS WITH PORK 398ML 24
short_description: For years, Heinz has proudly provided the highest quality products. Our Heinz Original Beans with Pork & Tomato Sauce are no exception! These Original Beans with Pork and Tomato Sauce is a traditional bean recipe with a blend of savoury pork in a tangy tomato sauce. Heinz Beans have been proudly prepared in Canada for over 100 years!

product_name: Heinz Deep-Browned Beans with Pork & Molasses, 398 mL Can, HEINZ MOLASSES & PORK BEANS 398ML 24
short_description: For years, Heinz has proudly provided the highest quality products. Our Heinz Deep-Browned Beans with Pork & Molasses are no exception! Try these rich, flavourful beans in a hearty sauce for the perfect complement to a variety of meals. Heinz Beans have been proudly prepared in Canada for over 100 years!

product_name: Old El Paso Mexican Refried Beans, Pinto Beans, 398 ml, 398 mL
short_description: Savour the authentic, rich taste of Old El Paso Refried Beans, crafted with hearty pinto beans cooked to perfection for an unforgettable flavour experience. These scrumptious refried beans serve as a mouth-watering side dish or a tasty addition to burritos, tacos, and other Mexican favourites. Embrace the vegetarian goodness with this wholesome, plant-based option that is both delectable and vegetarian-friendly. Elevate your snacking game by following the step-by-step instructions on the can to create a delicious, multi-layered bean dip that will impress your guests and tantalize your taste buds. Look for the blue fish MSC logo on our packaging.

product_name: Stanislaus Al Dente Ultra Premium Pasta Sauce 2.84L
short_description:
Bring a dependable, chef-level red sauce to every plate. Stanislaus Al Dente Ultra-Premium Pasta Sauce offers a slow-simmered tomato character, balanced acidity, and a clingy texture that sticks to pasta for fuller flavor in every bite. In a 2.84 L, it’s built for busy services—quick to heat, easy to finish, and consistent from the first ladle to the last.

Why Kitchens Choose It

You need speed without sacrificing flavor. This ultra-premium sauce lands right in the sweet spot: rich tomato depth with a clean finish that works across classic and modern menus. It reduces evenly for thicker applications, stays glossy on the pass, and won’t water out your plate or pizza.

From “Heat & Serve” to Signature

Serve straight from the can for a quality house marinara—or build your signature quickly:

  • Arrabbiata: Olive oil, garlic, chili flakes, and a splash of pasta water.

  • Bolognese-style: Browned beef or sausage, soffritto, finish with milk or cream.

  • Vodka-style: Deglaze with vodka, add cream and Parmesan.

  • Herb finish: Butter, basil, and a touch of black pepper right before service.

One Product, Many Menu Slots

Stretch your inventory with a single product usable in pasta bowls, chicken parm, meatball subs, eggplant parm, lasagna, stuffed shells, baked ziti, pizza sauce, appetizer dips, and kids’ meals. It’s an easy way to standardize flavor and control COGS across multiple dishes.

Built for Volume & Catering

The 2.84L can format supports line service, banquets, and school or corporate programs. Hot-hold safely per your HACCP plan; batch cool and portion for next service as needed. For off-site events, it travels well in cambros and rethermalizes quickly.

Key Features & Benefits

  • Ultra-Premium Flavor – Deep, slow-simmered tomato taste guests remember.

  • Cling & Body – Coats pasta for even flavor distribution; reduces cleanly.

short_description:
Casa Di Mama… Homemade pizza taste just like Mama used to make! Dr. Oetker Casa Di Mama Pepperoni Pizza is topped with our tomato pizzeria style sauce, pepperoni and the perfect blend of Edam and mozzarella cheese. Enjoy delicious pizza moments with Dr Oetker!
• Pepperoni, Edam and Mozzarella Cheese
• Cook Time: 14-16 minutes
• Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients

Cooking Instructions:
1. Ensure oven rack is in the middle position. Preheat oven to 450oF (230oC). Keep pizza frozen until ready to bake.
2. Remove pizza from packaging
3. Loosen the baking parchment and lift off together with the pizza from the cardboard
4. Place the pizza with parchment on a dark or non-shiny pizza pan
5. Bake for 14-16 minutes and until cheese is melted and crust is golden brown.
NOTE: Individual oven cooking times may vary. CAUTION: Pizza will be very hot.

Easy to make and easier to enjoy, these deep dish single pepperoni pizzas serve up quality and flavor in minutes so you can get back to what matters. With two individual frozen pizzas per package, you can choose to make one or both. Just bake the frozen pizza in the oven for 22-24 minutes at 375°F or microwave for 2.5-3.5 minutes. In no time you're ready to enjoy a crispy, melty and perfectly crunchy pepperoni pizza that will satisfy you on the go. Keep pizza singles frozen until you're ready to enjoy. No matter the occasion, you can count on RED BARON. You can quickly bake our frozen single serve pizzas as part of an easy dinner or microwave them in minutes and take them with you wherever you're headed. Our frozen deep dish personal pizzas are so simple to make, giving you more time to focus on the people and moments that matter. product_name: McCain® Superfries® Crinkle Cut Fries, Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients, 650g
short_description: When the time calls for fingers over forks, reach for McCain® Superfries® Crinkle Cut French fries. These delicious frozen French fries are famous for their signature grooves that make them perfect for dipping. Their unique shape provides an amazing texture, and like all McCain fries they bake up deliciously in the oven and equally crispy and crunchy in the air fryer. Whether you’ve got friends over for the game or want to add some excitement to your next family dinner, pop these frozen McCain fries into the oven or air fryer to see why McCain Crinkle Cut French fries are truly a cut above. Made in Canada from domestic and imported ingredients. COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 360°F (182°C), fill basket halfway, air fry for 12-13 minutes, sliding out basket and shaking fries halfway through. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C) and cook for 18-22 minutes, turning halfway through. See full details on packaging.

product_name: McCain® Smiles® - Smiley Face Fries, 650g
short_description: Meals are more fun with McCain® Smiles®. McCain® Smiles® are low in saturated fat and contain no trans fat or cholesterol, so you can always feel happy about sharing these smiles with your friends and family. Enjoy them as a side to any meal to brighten your day. Kids love these smiley face fries for any occasion, and adults deserve to have some fun with their food too! COOKING INSTRUCTIONS: Air fryer - preheat to 300°F (150°C), arrange frozen McCain Smiles in a single layer in basket, air fry for 7-9 minutes to a light golden colour. Oven - preheat to 425°F (218°C), spread frozen McCain Smiles in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes, turning halfway through. Not recommended for cooking in a microwave. AA Beef Tri Tip Steaks may be the tastiest cut of beef you’ve never heard of. Rich, meaty and tender, this steak can do it all:

Marinate it and grill it on the BBQ.

Tri tip steak is as versatile as it is delicious, so give it a try—it may just become your favourite cut! Our tri tip steak comes with 2 to 4 steaks per tray, and is cut from AA Canadian beef for quality you can trust.

Cut from AA Canadian beef, our tender chuck steak value pack is vacuum sealed for freshness.

Try our honey ham in your next ham and cheese sammy, grilled panini or assorted sub. It’s also top notch as a pizza topping or as part of a fruit-and-protein plate.

Best of all, you can always feel confident sharing Piller’s ham, because it’s free from all major food allergens, including gluten, milk, peanuts, tree nuts, mustard, sesame, egg, fish, soy and sulphites.

product_name: Pride Of India - Spicy Chickpea Masala Papadum Lentil Crisp, 10 count (3.53oz - 100gm) - Microwaveable Instant Chips, Gluten-Free Vegan Crackers, Healthy Protein, Fiber & Iron Rich Snacks
short_description: Pride of India incorporates gourmet-grown food and herbal products from India into our daily life. These all-natural ingredients help enhance the overall health of the human body. Pride of India is family owned and operated, and we manufacture our products in the USA. Indian papadums (poppadoms or papad) are a traditional Indian snack food. They are similar to tortillas and flatbreads. Our papadums are made of chickpeas, lentils and Indian spices. Lentils contain healthy protein, iron, and fiber. Plus, they help reduce cholesterol. Because these lentil crisps are gluten free and don’t have trans fats, they are a healthier snack than traditional potato chips. These papadums are also handmade by women in India, and each purchase of these lentil crisps contributes to small businesses and women empowerment in India. Popadums are usually made as a dough that needs to rest before baking. These lentil crisps, however, are ready in seconds! Just put them over a heat source (oven, microwave, stove, etc.) for 60 to 90 seconds until crispy. Lentil crisps are a great meal starter or snack. With an intoxicating blend of Indian spices, you can eat them alone or dip them in sauces, curries, or hummus. This package contains 10 chili chickpea spicy papadum. Try other flavors of lentil crisps, and shop other health and beauty products by Pride of India.

short_description: Not your average chocolate chip cookie. Prepare yourself for a heavenly dose of melt-in-your-mouth chocolate chunks in the tastiest, all natural cookie dough. Product will last two additional months after the Best By date if kept frozen. Can be enjoyed baked or raw. Baking Instructions: 1. Preheat oven or toaster oven to 325 degrees fahrenheit 2. Place cookie dough portions on ungreased baking sheet 2 inches apart. For easier cleanup, place on parchment paper. 3. Bake 11-13 min for a soft and chewy cookie or bake 14-16 min for a crispier cookie 4. Remove from oven and let sit on baking sheet - cookies continue to bake as they cool. Enjoy!

product_name: Siete - Mexican Shortbread Cookies, 4.5oz
short_description: Pour yourself a glass of cold dairy-free milk! Siete Grain-Free Mexican Cookies are delicious gluten-free cookies, inspired by the traditional flavors of Mexico.Key InformationMexican Cookies Made With Almond Flour and Coconut SugarVegan and Cruelty-FreeFree From Gluten and GrainsNon-GMO Project VerifiedFamily-Owned BusinessProduct OverviewSiete Grain Free Mexican Cookies deliver the delicious flavors and textures of traditional Mexican sweets, with none of the guilt or refined sugar. Made with only the highest quality, plant-based ingredients, including nutrient-dense almond flour, crunchy pecans, and sweetened with coconut sugar, these mouthwatering, moreish cookies are free from dairy, gluten, grains, and absolutely anything artificial. Siete’s Grain-Free Mexican Cookies are made with love by their family, for you and yours. Siete Family Foods is a mission-based company, passionate about making and sharing delicious, nutritious Mexican sweet treats, gathering and participating in communities, and advocating for happy, healthy lifestyles among Latino families.Mexican Chocolate CookiesSiete’s delicious chocolate cookies deliver the spiced, comforting taste of traditional Mexican hot chocolate in a convenient cookie form. Flavored with rich, dark cocoa and warming cinnamon, these little bites of chocolate heaven are the perfect treat for all the family.Mexican Shortbread CookiesSiete’s take on traditional Mexican Shortbread Cookies, also known as hojarascas, or pan de Polvo, recreates that nostalgic treat found in any well-stocked Mexican bakery or pantry. They are crunchy, sweet, and moreish, elevated with a dash of cinnamon, and delicious alongside a steaming cup of coffee. Siete makes their traditional shortbread cookies with nutritious, nutty almond flour and crisp pecan pieces.Mexican Wedding CookiesSiete has developed a fantastic dairy-free, gluten-free alternative to the celebratory and much-loved Mexican wedding cookie. Essential for every wedding, quinceañera, anniversary, & special occasion, these cookies are made from a lightly sweetened blend of almond flour, pecans, powdered sugar, and cinnamon.IngredientsMexican Chocolate CookiesGrain-Free Flour Blend (Almond Flour, Tapioca Flour, Arrowroot Flour, Chickpea Flour, Cassava Flour), Coconut Oil, Coconut Sugar, Avocado Oil, Alkalized Cocoa Powder, Apple Cider Vinegar, Cinnamon, Sea Salt, Baking Soda, Jasmine Tea Extract.Mexican Shortbread CookiesGrain-Free Flour Blend (Almond Flour, Tapioca Flour, Arrowroot Flour, Cassava Flour, Chickpea Flour), Coconut Oil, Coconut Sugar, Avocado Oil, Apple Cider Vinegar, Sea Salt, Cinnamon, Baking Soda, Orange Peel Powder, Vanilla Extract, Jasmine Tea Extract.Mexican Wedding CookiesGrain-Free Flour Blend (Almond Flour, Tapioca Flour, Arrowroot Flour, Cassava Flour, Chickpea Flour), Coconut Oil, Coconut Sugar, Powdered Sugar, (Sugar, Tapioca Flour), Pecan Pieces, Avocado Oil, Apple Cider Vinegar, Sea Salt, Baking Soda, Cinnamon, Orange Peel Powder, Vanilla Extract, Jasmine Tea Extract.Frequently Asked QuestionsWhy are Siete Grain Free Mexican Cookies made with coconut sugar?Coconut sugar is derived from the dehydrated sap of the coconut palm tree, not from the coconut fruit. Siete Grain Free Mexican Cookies are sweetened with coconut sugar rather than refined cane sugar because it is a minimally processed, natural sweetener thought to be healthier than conventional sugar. It is known to retain some of the nutrients found in the coconut palm and contains a soluble fiber called inulin which is linked to minimizing post-cookie blood sugar spikes.

Maple Terroir Matcha Green Tea Maple Stroopwafel Cookies 1190g caddy x 2 (34g x 70 pcs)
short_description: Matcha Green Tea Maple Stroopwafel Cookies - Maple Terroir's Dutch-style stroopwafels has a filling made with pure matcha powder from Kyoto, Japan and pure maple syrup. They are so delicious it's hard to eat only one! These stroopwafels are made with premium non-GMO ingredients and contains 0g trans fat. Balls of dough are put into a heated waffle iron and pressed into a uniformly thin, round shape. After the waffle has been baked, and while it is still warm, it is split into thin layered halves. The warm matcha and maple syrup filling is then spread between the waffle halves, gluing them together. Each stroopwafel is individually wrapped for convenience and sharing. Athletes of all levels can also enjoy these delicious, chewy, energy-boosting stroopwafels. Place a stroopwafel cookie on top of a cup of hot tea or coffee for a melty treat or break one up as a topping for ice cream. Each 1190g caddy contains 35 individually wrapped stroopwafels, 34g per stroopwafel.

product_name: McCoy Teas Earl Grey Tea Individually Wrapped Tea Bags Collection Flavored Black Tea with Premium Tea from Sri Lanka, 20 Tea Bags
short_description: McCoy Teas Earl Grey is a classic blend of premium Ceylon black tea infused with the distinctive citrus flavor of bergamot. The combination of robust black tea and light citrus notes creates a smooth, well-balanced cup that can be enjoyed at any time of the day. Each tea bag is individually wrapped to maintain freshness, making it convenient for home, work, or travel. The double-chamber design allows the tea leaves to steep fully, ensuring a flavorful brew with every cup. Brewing is simple: steep one tea bag in freshly boiled water at 80°C for 2–3 minutes until the tea reaches a rich amber color. Enjoy plain, or customize with milk or lemon to suit your taste. Packaged in a 20-count box, McCoy Teas Earl Grey delivers a timeless tea experience in a format designed for everyday convenience.

product_name: McCoy teas Organic Earl Grey Black Tea Bags with Bergamot, Classic Ceylon Blend from Sri Lanka, 20 Tea Bags

Crafted using pure Ceylon black tea leaves and natural bergamot, this organic blend offers a bold, smooth flavor and an inviting aroma that tea lovers have enjoyed for generations.  Steeped in tradition and rich in character, this blend delivers a full-bodied flavor with floral and citrus notes, making it a standout among black teas. Whether you prefer your tea hot to accompany your morning routine or iced for a refreshing midday sip, McCoy Teas Earl Grey adapts effortlessly to your preferences. With no artificial additives or flavors, you get an authentic tea experience in every cup.  Brew by steeping one tea bag in water heated to 80°C for 2–3 minutes to develop a deep amber color and robust flavor. Ideal for both quiet moments or shared tea times, McCoy Teas Organic Earl Grey offers a balanced, aromatic experience that celebrates tradition, quality, and thoughtful sourcing.

product_name: Perrier Sparkling Carbonated Water – 6x1 L Plastic Bottle, 6 x 1L
short_description:
PERRIER Carbonated Natural Spring Water is daringly elegant and boldly refreshing. Originating from Vergèze, France, PERRIER has delighted beverage seekers for over 150 years with its unique blend of distinctive, sparkling bubbles and balance mineral content. PERRIER is committed to building a more sustainable world, pledging to safeguard the quality of our water and air by becoming 100% carbon neutral by 2022, and continuing to drive sustainability initiatives across transportation, packaging, sourcing, and manufacturing. Today, PERRIER 1 L plastic bottles are 100% recyclable and are made with 25% recycled plastic. By 2025, PERRIER’S plastic bottles will be made with 50% recycled plastic.

With zero calories and zero sugars or sweeteners, PERRIER Carbonated Natural Spring Water is a great healthy alternative to sugary soft drinks and is the perfect sparkling partner for delicious cocktails or mocktails. PERRIER is also refreshing on its own, making the 1 L plastic bottle ideal for on-the-go or to be enjoyed at home every day.
